story:
Twicycle is now shipping. Order yours at twicycle.com

 

 

 

 

 

If you are a cyclist, you no longer have to pick additional activity to workout your upper body. This bike does it all.

 

 

In addition to legs, you can work out your entire upper body by using the front cranks. Fire up your TRICEPS, CHEST, LATS, BICEPS, BACK and SHOULDERS. Strengthen your CORE. 

 

 

 

 

 

Workout the muscles on your entire body by using a combination of arm and leg cranks.

 

 

Twicycle makes climbing easier and faster as the load is spread over several limbs, resulting in less fatigue and less lactic acid build-up on each individual limb.

 

 

Because you can take over with your arms when your legs get tired, you can continue going when you would normally need a break.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Stay seated in your seat, evenly distributing weight to both wheels when going up steep hills in order to avoid loss of traction.

By pedaling with both arms and legs you can avoid "wheel spin" due to slippery road conditions.

 

 

By propelling yourself forward using both legs and arms at the same time, you benefit from increased power needed for sprints.

 

 

Get everything you normally would on a regular road bike + a lot more! 

Use Twicycle like a regular bike by pedaling with your legs only. Take over with your arms to give legs a break.

 

 

 

 

 

Special thanks to all media outlets that were kind to write about us.

 

 

 

 

Say you don't have time or motivation to go to the gym every day, but you spend half an hour or more commuting to work. You could use Twicycle as a means of travel to work and at the same time get a great full body workout as a side benefit. 
Riding is so much fun that without even realizing you will be doing a much higher intensity workout then you might do indoors for example.

 

 


One could use Twicycle arm cranks for short bursts at high intensity, putting max power on the arm cranks, similar to what a sprinter or track cyclist might do. This would also replicate doing sets in the gym.

If above is used with legs at the same time it will result in immediate higher top speed and acceleration.

 

 


Cycling for longer periods (endurance cycling) at a prescribed fitness plan (talk to your personal fitness adviser about the best plan for you) is great for weight loss as it burns a lot of energy and stored fats. With a normal bicycle, doing workouts in short succession (let's say on daily basis) starting with Monday, might leave your leg muscles too tired for the next day (Tuesday). But if you used Twicycle with both arms and legs you can burn the same amount of fuel/fat on Monday but be tiring each muscle group much less as the load is spread between them so you'd feel fresher for Tuesday.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Cast out of carbon fiber, the arm cranks are lightweight and super strong, doubling as steering handles. They can achieve tight maneuvers and allow you to pedal while turning.

 

 

Chest pad provides full upper body support while cycling with arms and prevents a rider from making contact with the chainring.

 

 

Twicycle comes with 8 gears on each drive system allowing you to perfectly adjust the resistance to fit your needs and driving conditions.

 

 

Twicycle utilizes a combination of high strength lightweight aluminium and carbon fiber for reliable, optimum performance.

 

 

Two independently operated drive systems use freewheels, so you can coast with either one to suit your riding style and situation.

 

 

Twicycle is equally suitable for both women and men.

 

 

Brakes are located on the handles.

 

 

An optional chain guard can also be fitted for those who feel the added accessory would benefit them and can be purchased as the extra perk as listed on this platform. Note that the chest pad prevents a rider from reaching the chainring.

 

 

 

The locking mechanism allows the main handlebar/crank to be locked in drop bar position. The handle grips will have some movement but the whole system can not rotate and can not provide drive to front wheel in this position.

 

 

 

 

Please note that these are preliminary specs and are subject to change based on manufacturer availability and prices.

  • Lightweight aluminium alloy frame in matte black
  • Carbon fiber forks
  • Aluminium alloy wheels with sealed bearing hubs
  • Shimano or Sram, 8-speed Cassettes x 2 (front and back) (16 gears in total)
  • Shimano gear shifters (downtube style)
  • Shimano Claris Derailleurs
  • Tektro Brakes

We'll update the tech specs once we are further in the production process.

Available sizes:

54cm
57cm
60cm

To find your bike size, talk to your local bike specialist or look up the information online.

If none of these sizes fit you, please contact us.

There is currently no option on this platform to select sizes of bikes. We will contact you to get your bike size.

 

 

 

 

Boyan Rista

Inventor and founder of Twicycle, entrepreneur, seasoned musician, songwriter, and music producer who loves outdoor adventures and traveling.

 

 

Goran Rista

Entrepreneur, co-founder of Twicycle, Audio and Visual Creative, Marketer, Session Drummer. Goran was one of the key personnel in the BeatBuddy Drum Machine Crowdfunding Campaign and product success.

 

 

 

We have completed product development and have working prototypes as seen in our video. We have done everything on our own budget with no help from outside investors. 

We need your help to bring this bike to market, so you too can enjoy it.

By pre-ordering today, you will enable us to begin with our initial manufacturing run. We will use the funds to pay for the necessary tooling and manufacturing costs, as well as other costs related to it. All funds will be used to bring the bike to market.

We will only proceed with manufacturing if we reach our funding goal. In a case we don't, we will refund you your money in full and we will not proceed with manufacturing.

 

 

Your support at this early stage is critical to the success of Twicycle product launch. 

Only if enough people contribute to this campaign will anyone get to experience this bike. Each pre-order brings us one step closer to that goal. Your contribution is important as will enable us to not only bring Twicycle to you, but to many others as well. 

"Help me to help you".

You will help us make more buzz and attract other like-minded cyclists, helping us build a Twicycle community from the get-go. Cycling in company is more fun.

To reward you for being one of the first adopters, you are obtaining the bike at a price way below retail. Once we come on the market, we will not be able to offer these prices to the general public. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As with any start-up business and product launch, there are certain risks associated with them.

We have been working intelligently to minimize those risks for both us and you and will continue to do so.

During the development process, we were faced with many challenges which we managed to overcome and find solutions. We are responsible, committed individuals that "own" the problem and don't stop until we see it through. There will likely be other challenges along the way. We are confident that we will find solutions to whatever curveball may be thrown our way.

Both of us Rista brothers are experienced in running successful businesses, manufacturing, and marketing. We are creative people. We create things and we find creative solutions to challenges.

We greatly appreciate the trust you show us by contributing to this project. We don't take that lightly and will give our best to bring you a bike that will blow you away!

 

 

If you are not able to take part in pre-orders, but would still like to help us bring the bike to others, you can do that:

  • Please share our video with your friends on social media. Tag friends you think may be interested.
  • Share this campaign page on Facebook, Twitter or in an email to your friends using the tools on top of the page.
  • Have a blog? Write an article about us. We'd be happy to give you an interview.

Thank you on our behalf and on behalf of everyone that will get to experience Twicycle.

We would like to thank the following individuals for their help and support: Luis Mejia, Jaimie Anne Lawson, Pavla, Jungle Boy, Nikola Nikolic, Dejan Stojic, Claire Daley from Premiere One PR, Julie Padilla, Nolan Doran, Misan Harriman and family, and friends.

 

 

 

Shipping

Do you ship to my country?

We will ship worldwide. However, if you find that the shipping cost for a single bike to your country is too high, you might want to consider a group buy with 4 other friends. We can arrange for air freight to a major airport at significantly lower shipping prices. Please contact us for details.

 

How much is shipping to my country?

Shipping fees for a single Twicycle are:

USA- $49, Canada- $175, UK- $49, Germany- $99, EU- $139, Serbia- $49, Russia- $139, *Australia- $312, *India- $239, *Rest of the world- $349.

*See previous answer for shipping options for group buy.

 

Will I have to pay VAT, GST, Import duties etc...?

Customers outside the EU and USA will be responsible for their own import fees and duties as determined by their own customs. Please check with your local government for rates and details.

 

When will I receive my Twicycle?

We plan to begin delivering bikes at the end of May. We'll keep you regularly updated on the process as we move along.

 

Will the bike need assembly?

Some usual assembly will be required and we will provide detailed instructions.

 

Bike Use

How do I brake? Won't all the cables get all tangled up with the cranks turning?

The brakes are located on the handles and in a position which would be similar to a normal drop bar on a road bike. The brakes are the usual road caliper brakes. The cables don't get mangled up as they are attached to handles with are always horizontal and connected to your hands... they simply move up and down.

 

It looks like too much coordination! Riding a bike is hard enough let alone having to use your arms as well…

Because the handlebars are parallel it quickly becomes very natural to users and once mastered is no different to riding a normal bike.

Skating, skateboarding, skiing, water skiing etc are all much much harder to master yet people learn that in matter of hours or minutes.

 

A chainring /sprocket right underneath your chin…is there any protection from it?

There is a Chest PAD where the rider is resting his chest on. The pad is in such a position that it keeps one’s face a considerable distance away from the chain/chainring.

An optional chain guard can also be fitted for those who feel the added accessory would benefit them and can be purchased as the extra perk as listed on this platform.

 

Why is Chainring Cover and locking mechanism under accessories and not included as part of the bike?

Producing such a new products costs a lot, especially when it comes to customized parts. We are already doing the first batch at no profit at all (and for some time in the future) just to try and popularize the product.

If we included the accessories as part of the bike, then the price of the bike would be that much higher... We gave the option to those who want savings to have the saving.

 

Can my fingers get caught in the chain while riding?

The chain can ONLY turn if the rider is turning it. The moment the rider stops turning the bars, the chain stops turning too… And the time you’re turning the handlebars, your fingers can not possibly be anywhere near the chain as they would be firmly on the actual handles.

 

Do I always have to use both legs and arms?

You can use only legs… only arms…or any combination of those. The arms drive the front wheel and the legs drive the back wheel completely independent of each other.

 

Do the handlebars always turn or can I stop turning them and still keep coasting?

The system on the handlebars is the standard ‘freewheel’ system which means that you can stop pedaling your arms at any time and just coast…


 

The low riding position looks like it could do damage to your neck/back?

It is no worse than any other road/race bicycle. Professional athletes have been using bikes with even lower aero positions with no evidence of any side effects.

Included Chest Pad on which the rider rests all of their upper body weight, alleviates the stress from the back therefore making twicycle even more comfortable than a normal road bike.

 

What’s it like for a daily urban commute? Or is more aimed at exercise and work out?

You can do either. Depending on how hard you push. Handling is just like a regular bike once you get used to it.

 

Have you considered offsetting the handlebar pedals by 180 degrees?

180 degree offset pedals work well for legs but are not desirable for the arms as it’s not great for steering… The current version with handles parallel is completely stable and feels immediately natural to first time users. 

 

Disclaimer

Please note that Twicycle is a sporting device and as such inherits all the usual risks associated with cycling and other physical sports. Doing sports comes with risks and users accept that they are solely responsible for their own safety when using Twicycle. Users are advised to approach learning to use Twicycle as they would learning a bicycle for the first time (or skateboarding, rollerblading, skiing, wake-boarding or any such sport that requires a degree of learning and practice etc) and not to attempt or expect to just get on it and cycle away at speed or in traffic. Sufficient practice and training in a controlled environment is strongly advised. Twicycle will publish instructional step by step videos on their website how to learn and set up Twicycles and users will be required to watch those before using the bikes.

Workout the muscles on your entire body by using a combination of arm and leg cranks.
 
 


Twicycle makes climbing easier and faster as the load is spread over several limbs, resulting in less fatigue and less lactic acid build-up on each individual limb.
 
 


Because you can take over with your arms when your legs get tired, you can continue going when you would normally need a break.
 
 
 

 

 
 


Stay seated in your seat, evenly distributing weight to both wheels when going up steep hills in order to avoid loss of traction.
By pedaling with both arms and legs you can avoid "wheel spin" due to slippery road conditions.
 
 


By propelling yourself forward using both legs and arms at the same time, you benefit from increased power needed for sprints.
 
 


Get everything you normally would on a regular road bike + a lot more! 
Use Twicycle like a regular bike by pedaling with your legs only. Take over with your arms to give legs a break.
 
 

 

 


 
Special thanks to all media outlets that were kind to write about us.
 

 

 
 

Say you don't have time or motivation to go to the gym every day, but you spend half an hour or more commuting to work. You could use Twicycle as a means of travel to work and at the same time get a great full body workout as a side benefit. Riding is so much fun that without even realizing you will be doing a much higher intensity workout then you might do indoors for example.
 
 

One could use Twicycle arm cranks for short bursts at high intensity, putting max power on the arm cranks, similar to what a sprinter or track cyclist might do. This would also replicate doing sets in the gym.
If above is used with legs at the same time it will result in immediate higher top speed and acceleration.
 
 

Cycling for longer periods (endurance cycling) at a prescribed fitness plan (talk to your personal fitness adviser about the best plan for you) is great for weight loss as it burns a lot of energy and stored fats. With a normal bicycle, doing workouts in short succession (let's say on daily basis) starting with Monday, might leave your leg muscles too tired for the next day (Tuesday). But if you used Twicycle with both arms and legs you can burn the same amount of fuel/fat on Monday but be tiring each muscle group much less as the load is spread between them so you'd feel fresher for Tuesday.
 

 

 
 

 
 
 


Cast out of carbon fiber, the arm cranks are lightweight and super strong, doubling as steering handles. They can achieve tight maneuvers and allow you to pedal while turning.
 
 


Chest pad provides full upper body support while cycling with arms and prevents a rider from making contact with the chainring.
 
 


Twicycle comes with 8 gears on each drive system allowing you to perfectly adjust the resistance to fit your needs and driving conditions.
 
 


Twicycle utilizes a combination of high strength lightweight aluminium and carbon fiber for reliable, optimum performance.
 
 


Two independently operated drive systems use freewheels, so you can coast with either one to suit your riding style and situation.
 
 


Twicycle is equally suitable for both women and men.
 
 


Brakes are located on the handles.
 
 


An optional chain guard can also be fitted for those who feel the added accessory would benefit them and can be purchased as the extra perk as listed on this platform. Note that the chest pad prevents a rider from reaching the chainring.
 
 

 
The locking mechanism allows the main handlebar/crank to be locked in drop bar position. The handle grips will have some movement but the whole system can not rotate and can not provide drive to front wheel in this position.
 

 

 

 
Please note that these are preliminary specs and are subject to change based on manufacturer availability and prices.

Lightweight aluminium alloy frame in matte black
Carbon fiber forks
Aluminium alloy wheels with sealed bearing hubs
Shimano or Sram, 8-speed Cassettes x 2 (front and back) (16 gears in total)
Shimano gear shifters (downtube style)
Shimano Claris Derailleurs
Tektro Brakes

We'll update the tech specs once we are further in the production process.
Available sizes:
54cm57cm60cm
To find your bike size, talk to your local bike specialist or look up the information online.
If none of these sizes fit you, please contact us.
There is currently no option on this platform to select sizes of bikes. We will contact you to get your bike size.
 

 

 
 
Boyan Rista
Inventor and founder of Twicycle, entrepreneur, seasoned musician, songwriter, and music producer who loves outdoor adventures and traveling.
 
 
Goran Rista
Entrepreneur, co-founder of Twicycle, Audio and Visual Creative, Marketer, Session Drummer. Goran was one of the key personnel in the BeatBuddy Drum Machine Crowdfunding Campaign and product success.
 


 

 
We have completed product development and have working prototypes as seen in our video. We have done everything on our own budget with no help from outside investors. 
We need your help to bring this bike to market, so you too can enjoy it.
By pre-ordering today, you will enable us to begin with our initial manufacturing run. We will use the funds to pay for the necessary tooling and manufacturing costs, as well as other costs related to it. All funds will be used to bring the bike to market.
We will only proceed with manufacturing if we reach our funding goal. In a case we don't, we will refund you your money in full and we will not proceed with manufacturing.
 


 
Your support at this early stage is critical to the success of Twicycle product launch. 
Only if enough people contribute to this campaign will anyone get to experience this bike. Each pre-order brings us one step closer to that goal. Your contribution is important as will enable us to not only bring Twicycle to you, but to many others as well. 
"Help me to help you".
You will help us make more buzz and attract other like-minded cyclists, helping us build a Twicycle community from the get-go. Cycling in company is more fun.
To reward you for being one of the first adopters, you are obtaining the bike at a price way below retail. Once we come on the market, we will not be able to offer these prices to the general public. 
 

 

 

 


 

 
As with any start-up business and product launch, there are certain risks associated with them.
We have been working intelligently to minimize those risks for both us and you and will continue to do so.
During the development process, we were faced with many challenges which we managed to overcome and find solutions. We are responsible, committed individuals that "own" the problem and don't stop until we see it through. There will likely be other challenges along the way. We are confident that we will find solutions to whatever curveball may be thrown our way.
Both of us Rista brothers are experienced in running successful businesses, manufacturing, and marketing. We are creative people. We create things and we find creative solutions to challenges.
We greatly appreciate the trust you show us by contributing to this project. We don't take that lightly and will give our best to bring you a bike that will blow you away!
 


 
If you are not able to take part in pre-orders, but would still like to help us bring the bike to others, you can do that:

Please share our video with your friends on social media. Tag friends you think may be interested.
Share this campaign page on Facebook, Twitter or in an email to your friends using the tools on top of the page.
Have a blog? Write an article about us. We'd be happy to give you an interview.

Thank you on our behalf and on behalf of everyone that will get to experience Twicycle.We would like to thank the following individuals for their help and support: Luis Mejia, Jaimie Anne Lawson, Pavla, Jungle Boy, Nikola Nikolic, Dejan Stojic, Claire Daley from Premiere One PR, Julie Padilla, Nolan Doran, Misan Harriman and family, and friends.   ShippingDo you ship to my country?We will ship worldwide. However, if you find that the shipping cost for a single bike to your country is too high, you might want to consider a group buy with 4 other friends. We can arrange for air freight to a major airport at significantly lower shipping prices. Please contact us for details. How much is shipping to my country?Shipping fees for a single Twicycle are:USA- $49, Canada- $175, UK- $49, Germany- $99, EU- $139, Serbia- $49, Russia- $139, *Australia- $312, *India- $239, *Rest of the world- $349.*See previous answer for shipping options for group buy. Will I have to pay VAT, GST, Import duties etc...?Customers outside the EU and USA will be responsible for their own import fees and duties as determined by their own customs. Please check with your local government for rates and details. When will I receive my Twicycle?We plan to begin delivering bikes at the end of May. We'll keep you regularly updated on the process as we move along. Will the bike need assembly?Some usual assembly will be required and we will provide detailed instructions. Bike UseHow do I brake? Won't all the cables get all tangled up with the cranks turning?The brakes are located on the handles and in a position which would be similar to a normal drop bar on a road bike. The brakes are the usual road caliper brakes. The cables don't get mangled up as they are attached to handles with are always horizontal and connected to your hands... they simply move up and down. It looks like too much coordination! Riding a bike is hard enough let alone having to use your arms as well…Because the handlebars are parallel it quickly becomes very natural to users and once mastered is no different to riding a normal bike.Skating, skateboarding, skiing, water skiing etc are all much much harder to master yet people learn that in matter of hours or minutes. A chainring /sprocket right underneath your chin…is there any protection from it?There is a Chest PAD where the rider is resting his chest on. The pad is in such a position that it keeps one’s face a considerable distance away from the chain/chainring.An optional chain guard can also be fitted for those who feel the added accessory would benefit them and can be purchased as the extra perk as listed on this platform. Why is Chainring Cover and locking mechanism under accessories and not included as part of the bike?Producing such a new products costs a lot, especially when it comes to customized parts. We are already doing the first batch at no profit at all (and for some time in the future) just to try and popularize the product.If we included the accessories as part of the bike, then the price of the bike would be that much higher... We gave the option to those who want savings to have the saving. Can my fingers get caught in the chain while riding?The chain can ONLY turn if the rider is turning it. The moment the rider stops turning the bars, the chain stops turning too… And the time you’re turning the handlebars, your fingers can not possibly be anywhere near the chain as they would be firmly on the actual handles. Do I always have to use both legs and arms?You can use only legs… only arms…or any combination of those. The arms drive the front wheel and the legs drive the back wheel completely independent of each other. Do the handlebars always turn or can I stop turning them and still keep coasting?The system on the handlebars is the standard ‘freewheel’ system which means that you can stop pedaling your arms at any time and just coast… The low riding position looks like it could do damage to your neck/back?It is no worse than any other road/race bicycle. Professional athletes have been using bikes with even lower aero positions with no evidence of any side effects.Included Chest Pad on which the rider rests all of their upper body weight, alleviates the stress from the back therefore making twicycle even more comfortable than a normal road bike. What’s it like for a daily urban commute? Or is more aimed at exercise and work out?You can do either. Depending on how hard you push. Handling is just like a regular bike once you get used to it. Have you considered offsetting the handlebar pedals by 180 degrees?180 degree offset pedals work well for legs but are not desirable for the arms as it’s not great for steering… The current version with handles parallel is completely stable and feels immediately natural to first time users.  DisclaimerPlease note that Twicycle is a sporting device and as such inherits all the usual risks associated with cycling and other physical sports. Doing sports comes with risks and users accept that they are solely responsible for their own safety when using Twicycle. Users are advised to approach learning to use Twicycle as they would learning a bicycle for the first time (or skateboarding, rollerblading, skiing, wake-boarding or any such sport that requires a degree of learning and practice etc) and not to attempt or expect to just get on it and cycle away at speed or in traffic. Sufficient practice and training in a controlled environment is strongly advised. Twicycle will publish instructional step by step videos on their website how to learn and set up Twicycles and users will be required to watch those before using the bikes.

story:
MICLIMATE IN THE PRESS

 

 

 

HELP US REACH A GOAL OF 250 UNITS 

 

Whatever the weather, it’s always comfortable in your car, because it’s climate controlled. And now, you can experience the comfort of climate control on your motorcycle.

We’ve got the solution with “wearable climate” 

Automotive climate control works only when you are inside the car. Wearable Climate manages your comfort while you are riding and keeps working even when you step off your bike and walk away!  Wearable Climate stays with you whether you are riding, stopped at a gas station or even site seeing or hiking. Wearable battery-powered climate control keeps you comfortable anywhere. MiClimate is based on a US Navy technology developed for soldiers operating in extreme weather conditions and now it’s available to you.  It’s a motorcyclists dream come true.

An ergonomically astute,  rugged unisex design for riders in different weather conditions fits your profile as a motorcyclist.  

Wear it Loud!

 

 

OUR STORY

Founder Pankaj Sinha moved to Singapore in 2010 on a two year assignment for Intel. While in Singapore, he tried to play golf regularly, but high temperatures and humidity greatly diminished his enjoyment of the game.

An engineer, he was determined to find a solution so he could golf in comfort. Probing friends and professionals who loved outdoor activities like biking, hiking, fishing, hunting, and even casual gardeners, he found they shared a similar sentiment. They would love to be able to enjoy the outdoors in more comfort in a wider range of conditions.

Researching the market further, Sinha discovered a dire need for a product that could both heat and cool not only for sports and outdoor enthusiasts, but in far more critical areas such as health and medical services, support for the elderly, and air conditioning for the developing world.

He was really looking for a wearable climate control system.  Fortunately, he was able to license a patented technology from the US Navy to commercialize. Further research inspired  MiClimate, whose purpose is to provide relief from uncomfortable temperatures in a wide range of uses for people all over the world.

VALUE FEATURES: HOT, COLD, AND SWEAT

The strap goes around your waist and is inconspicuously hidden under your shirt. No need to put on another layer to keep yourself comfortable.  No need to wash and clean another high tech garment.  Remove and tuck the system away in your glove box when it is time to relax at home.  

Silicone sheath provides additional sturdiness.  Adjustable strap in contact with skin is fabricated out of neoprene fabric for adequate comfort.  

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS


 

Please share with us how you used MiClimate and how it can make your life more enjoyable.

TIMELINE

Consider MiCli 1 as a Christmas gift this season.

FAQ

Please visit our website www.miclimate.net for FAQ

story:
Founded with the RECKLESS OPTIMISM and sincere belief that bikes should be part of everyone's everyday. 

At Bikes ORO, we believe bikes can connect the world through community building, individual empowerment, and access to opportunity. Everyone should have the chance to own and ride a bike. For every ORO bike purchased, we support the donation of a bike to someone in need. 

This campaign is an opportunity to claim one of the first batches of ORO bikes and join us in building a more sustainable world.


Why ORO? Hear it straight from ORO's founder, Chelsea: 


"ORO started as inspiration to find a way to sustainably fund getting bikes to people in need. I spent time living in Uganda and Bolivia and saw how powerful access to a bike could be to change someone's life. I set out to solidly link the profit and the non-profit sides of bikes. Because, in my opinion, bikes enable access to opportunity and that is a beautiful thing that everyone deserves. 

The more I thought about our lifestyle, the more I saw the opportunity ORO could fulfill at home: to make biking accessible to an ever broadening bike ridership. Lots of people work hard to take care of their health, take care of our environment, run races for charity, the list goes on! Those people who CARE seem like people who should be on bikes, some are and some aren't. 


Why are some of these people not riding? It comes down to a lot of things, but at it's core,  it's accessibility. People don't know what to buy, how to discern the quality, or how to care for a bike. With Bikes ORO, we designed the bikes to be simple. They're low maintenance and great for getting around town, commuting or going to the farmers market.

They're for everyday use and suited well for most situations. We're telling you about the bike the way it is, not with advanced terms, but simply by how it can be used. 

So, the question comes down to, why not bike? And we've got a good one for you, so read on for bike details! " - Chelsea, Founder, Bikes ORO



  • No Chain, Grease Free, Low Maintenance - Gates Belt Drives are unique because they're made of rubber reinforced with carbon fiber. They last 7x longer than chains, do not rust, do not need grease, and create a wonderfully smooth ride. 
  • Durable, Light, Strong - Our frames are built of 4130 Chromoly Steel. You won't break it and you can lift the bike with ease. 
  • 3 Speeds - and 3 speeds only! We were bored of decision making paralysis, so we picked the best for you. Having 3 speeds optimizes your range per gear. It's perfect for riding in most conditions. Fun fact: the French used to use 3 speeds for their touring (long distances) gear set.
  • Internally Geared Hub - That means all the gears are INSIDE the back wheel! Whaaa! Internally geared hubs are low maintenance, easy to adjust, and use no grease. The majority of bike share programs use this type of hub because of its durability. 
  • Unique Features + Low Price Point - You'll be hard-pressed to find any belt driven bikes at your local bike shop (except our wonderful partners). In fact, you won't find any other  Gates belt bike at this price point. There's no doubt that this is the "drive" you want on your everyday bike.


FYI: We are only launching the PORTEUR model through this Indiegogo campaign. That's the bike pictured above with the basket! If you'd prefer one of the other 2 models, email chelsea@bikesoro.com with the subject "Model request"  and she'll add you to the waiting list. Estimated production is 2017 for those models. 

FYI #2: We removed the fun spoke design (the metal pieces inside the wheels). They're "standard" style again. The styling can throw off the calibration of the wheel and make it become distorted. We are putting your safety first! 


The unique ORO design - curved of the top tube, beautifully colored spacers, 26" tires, delightful front basket and more - comes from the bike design powerhouse, Flying Machine.  FM's Founder and Master Builder, Matthew Andrew, custom designs and hand builds stunning, high-end, bikes for people around the world. 





Bikes are engines of social and economic change for people globally - especially those living in impoverished conditions. Currently, there is no way to sustainably fund bike distribution for people in need, so that is why we created Bikes ORO. Access to mobility is POWERFUL — to enable children to get to school, men & women to access professional opportunities, and anyone to reach quality health clinics. 

Over 15% of the profit from each bike sale goes to support getting people access to these bikes (specific % not available because shipping costs can vary changing the numbers). 

For STUDENTS: Attendance increases up to 28% and grades increase up to 56%


For ENTREPRENEURS: Individuals can travel up to 4x farther, carrying 5x more, leading to up to 50% increases in profits. 


Over 15% of our profits from each bike sale in this campaign go to World Bicycle Relief to help get a student, entrepreneur, or healthcare worker onto a Buffalo bike (pictured below). These bikes are custom designed for carrying large loads, durability, and ease of maintenance. They're also assembled in country -- providing jobs to people in the area -- and distributed in partnership with local nonprofits to individuals.

Check World Bicycle Relief's website for additional information on the specific design of the Buffalo Bike.  



THE PERKS! 



The good news is that we have spent over a year designing, prototyping, and setting up this company to manufacture and fulfill successfully. We pledge to be upfront with you and transparent throughout the entire process, so you can stay updated on any challenges we may face (and help us celebrate success!). 

Not meeting the entire funding goal (flex account): We picked an Indiegogo Flex Campaign, meaning that we will receive the money this campaign generates even if we do not hit our goal number. The reason we picked flex is because we are able to support more payment methods for you. If we do not not hit our goal, our timeline could be delayed while we raise the additional capital to build your bike. We are  working hard to make sure this does not happen! 
Manufacturing: Mass production manufacturing can be risky and unexpected variables can arise. Luckily, we have a great team for manufacturing and they have been working in industry for years. They've been nothing but trustworthy and timely throughout our prototyping process, so we are excited to be working with them for a bigger production round. 
Fulfillment: After we place our order, there are things that can happen to impede our process efficiency. One of the component manufacturers could deliver their product slowly, a shipment could be lost, an important machine could break, import ports could go on strike. This is part of the risk you take with international manufacturing and fulfillment, but again, we fully trust the team we have in place to minimize any unforeseen delays. 


What size is the frame?

We have 3 frame sizes built for SMALL (if you're 5'0"-5'4"), MEDIUM (if you're 5'5"- 5'7"), and LARGE (if you're 5'8" - 6'2") riders. Pick your size based on your height and, if you fall on a border, size down (it’s better to be able to touch the pedals!). 

What size are the tires?

26" x 1.5"

Is the frame aluminum or steel?

4130 Chromoly Steel. Very durable and the frames are average weight for commuter bikes. 

How much does the THIN weigh?

The bike weighs 28 pounds. 

What are the benefits of the Gates Carbon Drive?

They’re low maintenance, you need no grease to keep it running, it lasts 7x than a chain, and works on an internally geared back hub system (so the gears are less likely to get out of whack, and when they do, it’s easy to adjust). 

Is there a way for me to ride one of these bikes? 

We’re throwing launch parties at a few breweries across the country where we’ll have ONE, medium sized frame with us. We’d love for you to come and give it a ride, test it out. Parties in Cape May, NJ; Cincinnati, OH; Denver, CO; Boulder, CO; Philadelphia, PA; and Washington DC. Check out our event locations here. 

What is the gear ratio of the drive systems?

3 speed. Best gear range for most situations — from flat to reasonably hilly. 

Does this bike have quick release on the tires? 

The front tire has quick release.

When will I receive my ORO bike? 

Check out the Timeline above for that information. 

Can I get a refund?

Please read Indiegogo's policy here. 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

The backer is responsible for any additional taxes. 

Want to get more involved with our team? 

Apply to be an Ambassador and help us tell the story!

The reason we picked flex is because we are able to support more payment methods for you. If we do not not hit our goal, our timeline could be delayed while we raise the additional capital to build your bike. We are  working hard to make sure this does not happen! 


Manufacturing: Mass production manufacturing can be risky and unexpected variables can arise. Luckily, we have a great team for manufacturing and they have been working in industry for years. They've been nothing but trustworthy and timely throughout our prototyping process, so we are excited to be working with them for a bigger production round. 


Fulfillment: After we place our order, there are things that can happen to impede our process efficiency. One of the component manufacturers could deliver their product slowly, a shipment could be lost, an important machine could break, import ports could go on strike. This is part of the risk you take with international manufacturing and fulfillment, but again, we fully trust the team we have in place to minimize any unforeseen delays. 








What size is the frame?
We have 3 frame sizes built for SMALL (if you're 5'0"-5'4"), MEDIUM (if you're 5'5"- 5'7"), and LARGE (if you're 5'8" - 6'2") riders. Pick your size based on your height and, if you fall on a border, size down (it’s better to be able to touch the pedals!). 
What size are the tires?
26" x 1.5"
Is the frame aluminum or steel?
4130 Chromoly Steel. Very durable and the frames are average weight for commuter bikes. 
How much does the THIN weigh?
The bike weighs 28 pounds. 
What are the benefits of the Gates Carbon Drive?
They’re low maintenance, you need no grease to keep it running, it lasts 7x than a chain, and works on an internally geared back hub system (so the gears are less likely to get out of whack, and when they do, it’s easy to adjust). 
Is there a way for me to ride one of these bikes? 
We’re throwing launch parties at a few breweries across the country where we’ll have ONE, medium sized frame with us. We’d love for you to come and give it a ride, test it out. Parties in Cape May, NJ; Cincinnati, OH; Denver, CO; Boulder, CO; Philadelphia, PA; and Washington DC. Check out our event locations here. 
What is the gear ratio of the drive systems?
3 speed. Best gear range for most situations — from flat to reasonably hilly. 
Does this bike have quick release on the tires? 
The front tire has quick release.
When will I receive my ORO bike? 
Check out the Timeline above for that information. 
Can I get a refund?
Please read Indiegogo's policy here. 
Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?
The backer is responsible for any additional taxes. 

Want to get more involved with our team? 
Apply to be an Ambassador and help us tell the story!

story:
I have just got back from volunteering in Marrakech helping out in orphanages and I was lucky enough to meet this child. He is only 7 years old, he has suffered from a condition affected his feet and legs since he was born however his parents live up in the mountains in Marrakech and don’t have enough money for the necessities in life let alone this life changing operation. He goes to school and studies like any other 7 year old would do however due to his condition he is unable to take part in sport and other social activities which he’d love to be able to do.

Having seen this first hand and meeting the child myself it made me realise how lucky most of us are and how much I would like to be able to help him have this life changing operation. The operation will cost £2,500 and I have decided to try and raise some money to help him and his family.

story:
What Is This 'Healing & Reconciliation' Training All About?

Almost all of us travel with “baggage” – anger, emotional hurt and pain from past conflicts. It’s a normal part of being human. The Mediate Your Life Healing and Reconciliation immersion retreat is a 4-day training that’s an extraordinary opportunity to:

·  Heal conflicts and wounds within yourself that prevent you from having the quality of relationships you really want,

·  Prepare to have conversations with others to reconcile past disconnection, and

·  Carry learning and practice into daily life to contribute healing and reconciliation to family, friends, workplaces and the world at large.

What I'm Seeking

I am seeking $3250 to fund 5 full Mediate Your Life scholarships (at $650 each) or even more partial scholarships for those who are able to pay partial tuition.

No donation is too small!  Contribute at one of the set amounts to receive perks or any amount at all.

100% of your contribution - less cost and shipping for book perks only - will go to supporting someone receiving this training for the first time or returning to deepen their understanding and practice of the skills.

Unlike some campaigns, every dollar received will be put to use toward a scholarship, regardless of whether we meet our goal or not.

And Why

People are registered and coming to this powerfully transforming 'Healing & Reconciliation' retreat from Texas and Oklahoma, as well as several other places in the U.S., but there are always those who long to participate who do not have the available funds.

And this is training that’s urgently needed – in our law enforcement communities, churches, schools and businesses, in addition to our homes and internal lives.  Every person who receives this training and begins to unlock resentment, disappointment and disconnection and find their way back to compassion, curiosity and understanding improves the world we all live in.

Whether participants set out to formally teach what they learn, mediate conflicts for others, or support people finding healing and reconciliation in their relationships, all of them begin to change the world around them, just by modeling greater emotional intelligence, an expanded capacity for understanding, and more compassionate curiosity for others.

The skills and processes that comprise Mediate Your Life training are drawn from decades of work with Marshall Rosenberg, founder of Nonviolent Communication, and the worlds of

·  professional dispute resolution
·  meditation and self-awareness
·  spiritual and wisdom traditions, and
·  contemporary psychology and brain science.

The result is nothing less than in-depth training in a new language, a new set of skills, and a new consciousness.

Learn more about Mediate Your Life training and John Kinyon at www.MediateYourLife.com.

What You’ll Receive

When you contribute to this scholarship fund, of course, you’ll begin to live in a world changing for the better and experience the satisfaction of making that meaningful contribution, but you can also receive perks like a thank you note from someone who benefitted from your donation, a copy of Choosing Peace by John Kinyon and Ike Lasater, or a 1.5-hour coaching session with me.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help!

  • You can spread the word about this scholarship campaign to your friends and family on Facebook, Twitter, in person and by email.
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools right here.

About Me

I’ve been studying, practicing and supporting the growth of Nonviolent Communication (aka Compassionate Communication or NVC) since 2004, and I began training with John Kinyon in 2008.

In 2010, I completed my first Mediate Your Life yearlong immersion program with John and Mediate Your Life co-founder Ike Lasater.  Later that year, I became a member of the training team for the Heartland immersion program in Kansas City, and I’ve been organizing Mediate Your Life retreats and workshops in Texas since 2011. 

I have also studied with NVC founder Marshall Rosenberg, as well as CNVC Certified Trainers Miki Kashtan, Raj Gill, Jeff Brown, Sylvia Haskvitz, Robert Gonzales and Karsten Schacht-Petersen.

I facilitate classes, workshops and practice groups in schools, spiritual communities, and wellness facilities, and I also provide mediation and conflict coaching for individuals and groups seeking compassionate resolution to conflict.

story:
Introducing YOGGI BALL, the most versatile, convenient and compact massage system ever invented. 

YOGGI BALL features a revolutionary all-in-one Modular Quick-Lock System. Its dual detachable massage balls, acupoint therapy, 3-speed vibration and soothing in-built heat therapy relieve sore, tight muscles in every inch of your body.

Whether you’re sitting at a desk all day, working out or playing sport, YOGGI BALL has got your back… and neck, shoulders, hips and anywhere else you feel pain. So, you can perform better, recover faster and live pain-free. 

Imagine a foam roller, massage ball, peanut, massage pillow all rolled into one. Because that’s exactly what we did… 

YOGGI BALL’s patent-pending all-in-one design does everything popular massage tools can in one single device. Convenient, compact and travel-friendly, it’s the last recovery tool you’ll ever need. 

Like Having a Personal Physiotherapist On-The-Go…

Designed in partnership with leading physiotherapists, YOGGI Ball delivers targeted treatment and deep healing to be the most effective therapeutic solution. Simply, it’s the next best thing to having your own personal physiotherapist with you 24/7.

Patent-Pending All-in-One Design

Everyone’s pain is different. That’s why we made YOGGI Ball completely customizable. Thanks to a Modular Quick-Lock System you can quickly and easily adapt YOGGI Ball for personalized pain relief.

The Best of Both Worlds: Automatic & Manual Therapy

YOGGI Ball’s ergonomically designed attachments target your primary and secondary muscle groups through versatile rolling, pressure and pinpointing therapy techniques.

It’s the best of both worlds: automatic and manual therapy to hit deep into sore muscles, painful trigger points and stiff joints. 

Made from medical-grade silicone, YOGGI BALL is powered by twin motors and a long-life rechargeable battery. 

Heat + Vibration = Ultimate Healing

Heat and vibration therapy are known to significantly enhance recovery.That’s why YOGGI BALL features in-built heat and 3-speed vibration therapy. 

With the simple push of a button, you’ll experience soothing heat and vibration throughout your aching muscles and joints. Just sit back and let YOGGI BALL do all the work.

Why Heat Therapy?

Heat therapy is highly effective for promoting blood flow, dilating blood vessels, lowering joint stiffness and reducing muscle inflammation and pain. 

Why Vibration Therapy?

Vibration therapy helps eliminate knots and tension in your muscles, reduce cramps, increase blood flow and promote joint stabilization.  Plus, it speeds up the muscle recovery process.  

Together, heat and vibration therapy are proven to deliver advanced recovery and healing.

By combining these two incredibly effective treatments in YOGGI BALL, rolling and kneading massage techniques become so much more effective. And with three speeds to choose from, you can choose the exact level of vibration therapy you need.

The innovative design of YOGGI BALL incorporates a full range of massage functions into one super compact device. And it’s as easy to use as it is effective.

To instantly switch between massage functions, simply snap and twist attachments using the Quick-Lock System. With just a couple of clicks, you can switch between dual ball rolling massage, targeted single ball massage, deep trigger point release, and heating and vibrating therapy.

Take a look for yourself at just how simple YOGGI BALL is to use…

To connect your YOGGI Ball, simply align the bolt bearing of the connector to the groove slot of the massage ball. Then, slide it along the slot until it locks securely in place.

Detaching your YOGGI Ball is effortless. Just slide each end of the YOGGI BALL towards the logo mark to disconnect. 

Heat and vibration with the push of a button. Simply press the function button to turn on, change vibration speed, and turn off. 

Made For Our On-the-Go World

Portable, lightweight and travel-friendly, YOGGI BALL is designed with your lifestyle in mind. 

Whether you’re a fitness fanatic, athlete, frequent traveler, weekend warrior or office worker, YOGGI Ball goes with you everywhere and adapts to your exact lifestyle.

With YOGGI BALL a part of your life you can…

Take Care of Your Body, Anywhere

Sore muscles travel with you. And so does YOGGI BALL. Whether you’re at the office, gym, home or even on the plane, it’s finally possible to take care of your body anywhere, anytime.

YOGGI BALL is so flexible it can be used standing, sitting or lying -- no matter where you are. Anytime you need instant and easy pain relief, YOGGI BALL is there for you.

 

Put simply, YOGGI BALL is designed for total body therapy. 

Its ergonomic, precisely shaped attachments hit deep into sore muscles with therapist-grade rolling, kneading, vibrating and heating treatment.  YOGGI BALL targets all minor and core muscle groups: 

When the YOGGI BALL is in its original POINTBALL form, it’s an incredibly versatile tool that hits deep into almost any muscle, like hamstrings, quads, calves and trapezius. 

Often your pain stems from sore, hard-to-reach trigger points deep in muscles. 

The pointed handle attachment transforms YOGGI BALL into the ACUPOINT BALL to target sharp pressure points, such as the forearm, neck, chest, head and feet. It works just like the expert fingers of a physiotherapist.

YOGGI BALL is remarkably customizable. Connect a second ball attachment to instantly convert it to a DUALPOINT ROLLER to target large muscle groups like your back, legs and hips.  

Expertly Designed in Collaboration with Leading Physiotherapist

“As a physiotherapist, I know that muscle stiffness and pain can be very effectively treated by heat and vibration. So, the YOGGI BALL is actually very good for both these functions as it also incorporates customizability with attachments.  - Recommended by Dickson Lam (Physiotherapist) - UUUSH Physiotherapy Centre.  

 

 

 

Shipping will be charged after the campaign is completed through the pledge manager. The shipping rates listed above are estimates and may change based on future shipping rates.

By charging shipping after the campaign, we can properly assess the final weights and size of our products, as well as group backers for shipping efficiency to ensure you get the lowest shipping cost. 

It’s our goal to be as transparent and fair as possible about shipping. No one likes to pay to ship, and we are committed to doing our best to minimize its impact on everyone.

About The YOGGI BALL Team

YOGGI BALL is the creation of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu Champion Fernando Junior and Yoga teacher Arvy Chan, in partnership with UUUSH Physio Therapist Centre. 

Fernando has spent most of his life training and practicing Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu at the highest level. While Arvy has dedicated her life to the pursuit of health and wellness through Yoga.

After years searching for the perfect recovery tool, the company founders invented YOGGI BALL, designed in conjunction with leading physiotherapist Dickson Lam.

Now, they need the generous support of the amazing Kickstarter community to bring their vision to life!

Fernando Junior 

“Having spent decades practicing Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, recovering from aches and pains has been the number one thing that slowed my progress and held me back,” 

“I have tried just about every other kind of massage device but found they fell short of the therapy and healing I needed. So, I set out to create the most versatile and effective recovery tool available – YOGGI BALL.”

Arvy Chan

“Everyone’s pain and recovery is different. And with YOGGI BALL you can fully customize and personalize your treatment with an amazing variety of attachments and functions.”

 Alliance for quality assurance of crowdfunding's product development

Hong Kong’s first and only centre of Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, Capoeira, Yoga and Movement. 

Uuush Physiotherapy Centre specializes in a wide range of physiotherapy services to get clients feeling healthier than ever before. 

Dedicated Crowdfunding PR and Marketing Agency

Risks and challenges

With any new product launched on Kickstarter there are potential challenges that exist in design and manufacturing.

But, know this, we have assembled a team of highly experienced design, manufacturing and supply-chain specialists to understand and minimize all potential risks. But, as any product developer will tell you, it’s impossible to rule them out completely. We want to be transparent with you. So, here is how we are preparing for risks and challenges.

MANUFACTURING: YOGGI Ball has a revolutionary design, which means there’s some complex tooling, manufacturing processes and precise engineering needed to create the product. In a large-scale manufacturing project of this kind, there’s the potential for challenges to arise with setting up tooling, sourcing materials and the manufacturing process itself.

Our design team is highly experienced when it comes to working on complex manufacturing projects like YOGGI Ball. And our established relationships with a reliable and reputable manufacturer minimizes manufacturing risks significantly. Plus, YOGGI Ball team members will be on the ground working directly with our manufacturer to oversee every step of the process.

QUALITY CONTROL: When manufacturing at scale, it’s common for there to be a variance in quality due to the large number of units being produced. By working with our established manufacturing partners and being on the ground to monitor and inspect the process, we are putting every effort into ensuring the high standard of product we require and you deserve. We will also perform industry-standard quality control testing to ensure we deliver the highest quality product.

PRODUCT CHANGES: We’ve spent close to a year designing YOGGI Ball. The product you see is extremely close to the final design. But, as we enter full-scale production, some minor changes may be needed to manufacture at scale. This process is commonly known as Design For Manufacturing, and is a routine part of manufacturing. Any changes made during this stage will only be made to create an even better product. We’ll be sure to let you know of any changes we make. And exactly why we made them.FULFILLMENT: We’ll work with a third-party fulfillment specialist to get you your product as quickly and smoothly as possible. However, delays and unforeseen circumstances can be a part of any delivery process. However, by working with an experienced logistics partner, we’re minimizing the risk of issues.

We’ll be sure to let you know of any changes we make. And exactly why we made them.FULFILLMENT: We’ll work with a third-party fulfillment specialist to get you your product as quickly and smoothly as possible. However, delays and unforeseen circumstances can be a part of any delivery process. However, by working with an experienced logistics partner, we’re minimizing the risk of issues.

story:
Big news!!!! 2 fights locked in
Olimpia fights Brazil

ITS ABOUT TO GO DOWN!!!!!
BRAZIL TIME AGAIN

MAY 3, 2014 IM BACK IN THE CAGE REPPING THE USA....

CASSIE CRISANO (USA) Vs GLAUCIELE STORM (BRAZ)

May 17, 2014
Cassie Crisano (USA) VS Daiana Torquato (BRAZ)


As a successful athlete, I bring ethics and hard work to any challenge or group I am a member of.

As an athlete, I know I am a role model to young aspiring athletes and I conduct myself in a respectable and appropriate manner in all situations, in and out of the cage.

By donating to help fund my air travel back to my coach in Brazil for my 7 week Pro-training camp.

Each and every individual that helps and donates any amount of money towards my training will receive a signed photo at the end of this campaign and anything over $25. free signature autographed tee ...I will also be obliged to set up personal training session for after my next professional fight summer 2014.... All pre deposited funds will go towards this camp and will get extra allotted time. Email me for appointments.. NYFIREFOX31@gmail.com

Contributing to me will allow me  the peace of mind to focus on my Professional goals and to continue my  focus on my aspirations.

By making a donation , you put your trust in me and I become an ambassador for the East Coast. As with every opportunity, I will represent the East Coast with the highest level of morals and ethics.

A little bit about me:

WWW.CASSIECRISANO.COM

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute,  that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • You can help me get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Nano-bubble technology - Game Changer

                                              for Africa and the World

                          Abundant Food and Pure Water for our World

          Give a woman or man a fish, and it’s enough to eat for a day.

              Help them to grow fish, and they will eat for a lifetime.

 Their children, and their community, will grow in peace and prosperity.

The Dream is .......

...the Next Big Thing  -  leading edge, ecologically - friendly nano-bubble technology applied to grow abundant fish, food and to purify water .  Although, we expect it to help many people, this  is a project to make products that help people help themselves. Not only can they become self-sufficient, but their success will grow the economy of their communities.  This is the kind of sustainable development that can bring people out of the tyranny of poverty.  Because there is obvious need, this project will be developed in Kenya and Ghana first, but can be easily and inexpensively applied anywhere in the world, including right here at home. 

Your assistance will help us to further develop applications that can be acquired by small communities and individual farmers to increase their food production, providing greater food security for their own families and enough surpluses to enter the market economy.Our eventual goal will be to impact food security in those parts of the world where crop failures  and  lack of clean water lead to hunger and disease.

My name is Dr. Peter Appleton  with  over 30 years experience in development of agriculture, food and pure water in Africa, Asia, Latin America, the United States and Canada.

Why act now?

Demographers have pointed to the need to double agriculture and food production by 2050. While this might seem an impossible dream, my work and that of many others  on the application of modern nanotechnology to food production has convinced us that  we can reach that goal. All we need do is to use the basic principles of the nanotechnology in a common sense way to produce right-sized and right-priced agriculture, aquaculture and water purification systems that will serve the needs of both subsistence and commercial farming worldwide.


                      Bill Gates said in 2012 that "nanotechnology will have a  

                        greater   societal impact than the personal computer".

His prophecy has already been apparent in great advances in the medical field.

Nano bubbles are used as a contrast agent in ultrasound treatment

Nano bubbles deliver medicine to fight cancer

Nano bubbles are used to detect malaria


Research of independent researchers over the past six years has shown that similar advances are possible in food production and water purification.

In recent years nano bubble research has increased rapidly as new applications are identified. These nano bubbles are so small that they can not be distinguished by the human eye. 

And nano micro bubbles can be generated in any environment at a low cost.


In field trials, we have seen nanotechnology – specifically using Nano bubbles that greatly increase water’s ability to provide efficient distribution of vital plant and fish nutrients - proven to increase the yields of agricultural crops by 35-75 %, double the yields of farmed fish and purify contaminated water from disease causing bacteria and viruses. All natural and without chemicals.

Nano bubbles provide natural nutrients without the use of fertilizers and pesticides

Radishes grown with nano bubble oxygenated water were 40% larger and heavier than radishes grown with normal water. No chemicals were used.

Arugula grown under supervision of independent agent achieved 34% more growth in 74 day trial with Nano water versus normal water,. No chemicals were used.( supervised by Bureau Veritas)

Nano bubbles deliver oxygen directly to the roots

Nano bubble oxygenated water doubled production of shrimp and tilapia while decreasing  mortality from 45% to 5% with no use of pharmaceuticals .

Shrimp raised in nano oxygenated water were 40% heavier in 30% less time than shrimp raised in normal water. Farm profit increased 60%. No use of chemicals.

Tilapia grown in nano oxygenated water achieved grow in weight  1.5 times that of fish raised in normal water in 30% less time.


Nano bubble water  will bring clean water to children at a low cost

Together we can provide proven technological solutions to helping the world feed itself and ensure abundant food and pure water for all.  The revolution that cell phones brought to communications will be dwarfed by the impact nano bubble technology will have on feeding the world.

What we need and what you get:

By this appeal we want to raise $275,000, which we believe will give us the start we need to bring our nano bubble agriculture, aquaculture and water purification systems to a stage of development at which they may be efficiently manufactured and used anyplace in the world.

With these funds we will design, test , and manufacture prototypes of nano bubble systems for agriculture, aquaculture and water purification. These products will  then be available to be commercialized worldwide.

Speaking of products, we have a range of unique products from artisans across East and West Africa for all contributors who believe in a world free of hunger and abundant pure water.  Please see our perks. Perhaps you would like to have breakfast with an elephant!

Impact:

Recent scientific studies have declared that the three serious challenges face the new generation: producing enough nutritious food to feed the ever growing world population, providing pure clean water for the health of the world's people and mitigating against the impact of climate change.

According to Harvard Physicist Dr. Russell Seitz ;

" The low energy cost of micro bubbles suggests a new approach to solar radiation management in water conversation and geo engineering. Don't dim the sun, brighten the water"

Dr. Seitz suggests that nano bubble injection into a 1 hectare water pan will save 3600 MT of water annually by reducing the evaporation rate.

Our project- nano bubbles for food abundance and pure water - addresses these three issues and offers solutions.

I and many colleagues worldwide have been looking for a way to make a major impact on resolving the food and water security problems of Africa and worldwide. 

This is our biggest step yet and the most important. Rather than solving problems one at a time, we can now through nanotechnology take a broad sweep and make that "game changing" step that will make the difference.

We need your help. We honestly believe that nano bubble technology can make that big difference.

                                                Too good to be true?

That's what they said about television, the fax machine, the internet and the cell phone.

Join with our team and together we can  bring this huge dream of a hunger free world to reality.


Risks & Challenges 

Our biggest challenge will be to overcome the " skepticism and too good to be true attitude" that has encompassed many in the international community when we introduce new technologies- much like the cell phone and the internet.

In order to mitigate this challenge we have  made arrangements with the University of the Cape Coast in Ghana to certify the trials for   the aquaculture system; the University of Ghana  and the University of Nairobi for the agriculture systems and with World Vision in northern Kenya for water purification and conservation.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can help financially - THANK YOU. But there are many others ways that  we can use your  help.

1) If you believe in a technological solution to severe world problems and have ideas of how technology can be applied- please tell us. We may even retain you to help us develop your idea.

2) Tell you friends and colleagues who might be  able to contribute financially or with great ideas .

3) Help us with this  and other campaigns. What are we doing right ? What are we doing wrong?  Your opinion and advise will help us do better. Thank you.

4) Use your savvy of social network and help us get the word out. Tell us what you are doing or what you think we should be doing and we will work with you. 

Project Management- Our Team

Dr. Peter Appleton- Project Owner

Peter has over 30 years international development experience in Africa, Latin America. He has a MSc in Agriculture Economics and a PHd in international Development and Finance.

Peter has owned and operated businesses in Africa, North America and Latin America.

Peter will be supported by an international Board of Advisers.

Mr. Hezekiah Muriuki- Project Manager, Nairobi, Kenya

Hezekiah has some 25 years international experience in agriculture development and has worked with national governments in Kenya, Tanzania and Uganda as well as many international institutions , UN, USAID, DFID, AfDB and World Bank.

He is supported by an East Africa Board of advisers from business, academia and government.

Mr. Tidiane Traore- Project Manager, Accra , Ghana

Tidiane has over 30 years international experience in business and agriculture, much of it in West Africa. He has a MBA from the University of Ghana. Tidiane has operated business in agriculture , transportation and shipping within Nigeria, Ghana , Guinea and Togo. He is an adviser to governments and international agencies in the region. 

He is supported by a West  Africa Board of advisers from business, academia and government.

Mr. James Davis- Director of Communications and Contributor Relations. 

A long-time adviser to the Agriculture Committee of the U.S. House of Representatives, in recent years served as adviser on agriculture projects in Ukraine and a project to bring a U.S. MBA program to Ukraine via distance learning.

Sidiki Sanogo - Technical Director and Project Director , Burkina Faso and Mali

Sidiki has a MSc from the Center d'etude de financiere economique et bancaire , France and a B.Sc. in agriculture science from the universities of Togo and Bunkina Faso.

He has many years experience in East Africa and West Africa in the introduction of new technologies to agriculture, aquaculture and regional business. Sidiki will be the technical liaison between the projects in Kenya and Ghana. He will also be responsible to introducing the technology to Mali , Burkina Faso, Benin , Togo and Cote d'Ivoire.


The Project Budget

Total $ 275,000

Fund raising $25,000

Fulfillment of perks $ 20,000

Months 1-4   $ 40,000

     Confirm current  nano bubble research and development in agriculture,

     aquaculture and water purification.

Months 5 -8   $ 40,000

     Prepare initial designs and assemble prototypes of agriculture, aquaculture and

     water purification nano bubble systems.

Months 9-12    $ 40,000

     Test on trial prototypes of nano bubble systems for agriculture, aquaculture

     and water purification.

Months 13-16   $ 40,000

     Redesign prototypes based on trail results .

Months 17-20  $ 40,000

    Re-trial redesigned prototypes and confirm market acceptance.

Months 21- 24  $ 30,000

     Finalize design for manufacturing.

Any additional funds above this budget will be used to speed up the design of the systems and to expand trials into other African countries.

story:
Behold. The njoy pure wand. 

I must own this, but at around £80 I can't afford it. 

See it here: http://www.njoytoys.com/products/purewand.php

But now it is my birthday. U can help. 

If 16 people give me £5, I will have £80. #maths

It is stainless steel. It is legitimately characterised as a "heavy metal dildo". We all know that metal is forever. 

Watch the video above and see how excited the reviewer is. She is literally on the ground with joy, and describes it as: "one of the best curves ever". 

Other reviewers say: 
"You can only have it if you pull it from my cold dead hands"
"You just can't put a price on a hard orgasm"
"I bought this for a friend. Now I hardly ever see her..."

Also seriously if you haven't got one of these and you have at least one orifice and some money please do yourself a favour. You will not regret it. 

(Please ignore the £500 request, that's just the minimum requirement set by Indiegogo. If you want to give me more than £80 that would be totally fine tho, I'll put it towards other fun things.)

story:
THE "QHUAS" MISSION

Qhuas' mission is to revolutionize health and fitness by providing a lifestyle that transforms the minds, bodies, and spirit of people.

Qhuas will use positive music and specially designed moves to create a spiritually uplifting environment.  Qhuas will show you that loving yourself, focusing on the blessings in your life, and strengthening your mind, body and spirit are key components to becoming a healthier, more effective, and empowered you!

With Qhuas, every component will be designed to uplift, empower, and enrich your life.

As a Doctor of Physical Therapy, former professional dancer, and aerobic dance instructor, Dr. Sean Thomas has always yearned for a way to combine his knowledge in the physical sciences and his work with faith based communities. When he met Tarence Farrell, founder of Levite Music Group and now VP of Qhuas, they both saw the benefits of developing a practical way to fuse exercise, positive motivating techniques, and uplifting music.

Qhuas' Indiegogo Project will fund:

•  The designing of a 45 minute praise based dance fitness program with Dr. Sean Thomas and his fitness team; geared towards aerobic fitness, positive motivation, and weight loss
• The completion of the writing and production of an intense spiritually uplifting exercise project that will detoxify the mind.
• The creation of Qhuas' educational seminars on nutrition and injury prevention 
•The designing of Qhuas' class tracker app and the research needed to create other innovative and resourceful health and fitness apps and online programs that will assist, motivate, and empower you to accomplish your total (mind, body, and spirit) health and fitness goals.
•The development of Qhuas certified fitness programs where we can offer training for you to be a Member of a Qhuas team so you can provide health classes in your own community.


WHY WE ARE CREATING QHUAS

With all the health and fitness programs, the medical alternatives, and the plastic surgeons, why is the count of obesity higher than it has ever been? What is missing? Today's health and fitness trends are based on identifying someone with the "ideal body" and working hard to make that your reality.  These programs are designed to make you wish for the body you don't have with promises that if you just follow their program you can look like the person on your screen or in the brochure.   

As a physical therapist, Sean has seen many people who have injured themselves on the path to this "ideal body".  Many have goals to become a certain weight no matter the cost.  Some suffer from serious depression once they realize that they may never obtain the "ideal body”.  At Qhuas we are working towards designing a lifestyle that will teach you to focus on being healthy, physically fit, and spiritually uplifted.  It will be a nurturing environment you’ll want to come back to.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    We understand if you can not contribute at this time, but that doesn't mean you can't help Qhuas get the funding it needs to go forward:

    • Please go out and spread the word to everyone you know so that Qhuas can get the funding that it needs to focus on all of the elements that are necessary for the success of this program.
    • We welcome any media and press contacts that would like to reach out to us; We love talking about the amazing things we are doing with this program so contact us today.
    • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools so that other supporters can find our project easily!

    "Thank you for all of your love and support. Qhuas will be a positive way of life that is needed in today's society and we are so blessed that you are a part of Qhuas. Together we will make a difference. We love you!"                  

     - The Qhuas Family
