72 T of #9 clay for the pond                                                           $  1,651
2 port-a-potties @ $95.00 per month ea                                       $  2,280
      for 1 year until permanent infrastructure installation
Indiegogo Campaign Fee (4-9%)                                                   $     872
TOTAL                                                                                           $11,980
Any additional funds received beyond our goal of $11,980 will be dedicated, exclusively to Phase 2 and 3 of the Common Ground Project: Homeless Garden, Veteran's Village and Veteran Equine Therapy. This includes additional veteran/homeless lodging, community kitchen, and additional related infrastructure.

We would greatly appreciate you taking the time to blast all your people with word of our campaign via Facebook, Twitter, email, or by utilizing the most powerful form, word of mouth.  Making a big difference has never been easier.

story:
Hello! My name is Terry (Teresa) Schlotzhauer Perry. I was recently injured in a riding accident on September 9th, 2012. Me & My Horse were riding down the road enjoying a nice afternoon after work that day when A White SUV swerved off the road at us scareing my horse. He jumped out of the way And I fell.. I had to be airlifted by helicopter to Shands At University of Florida Teaching hospital. I was in the Shock Trauma Unit there for 7 days. I have a lacerated liver, A fractured Scapula And 3 fractured ribs.

I Have grown up with horses and have been riding all my life, Never have I been injured this bad. Bruised up here and there yes but never to this extent. It is devastating to say the least.

I work full time as a Server/Bartender and was very comfortable with what I Made each week. All my bills were paid However there was not much left over for savings. And YES I do realize now I should have been more Proactive with that. (Hindsight?)

I Have been married for 28 years to my husband David. We have a 22 YO son named Tanner. And We have been raising 2 granddaughters from one of my husbands daughters for 9 years. Courtney who is 19 yo. just moved out on her own and we still have Mackenzie at home who is 11.

My Husband has Acute Kidney Failure and goes to Dialysis 3 times a week. He is on SSI disability Fixed income.  He pays for our rent everymonth which is 875.00. The rest of the living expences i am responsible for and willing pay each month.

Electric 250.00

Cable 129.00

cell phone 50.00

water/ sewer 80.00

Car Payment & insurace 400.00

Groceries 300.00

Gas 80.00

These are my basic expences that i pay each month. (1289.00)

I will not be able to Go back to work for 8 weeks minimum because of the liver injury. My job is safe and waiting and I personally cant wait to get back. i love my job and where I work.

I am asking for help with our living expences for the next 2 months. They are the barebones minimum I can get away with paying. I have no savings and literally a zero balance in my checing account from paying all I could for this month.

This is a Very humbling experience to ask for anything. I have worked and paid my way my whole life never asking for anything. I love helping others and do when ever possible but actually asking for help for myself is very difficult but i realize I have to if I want to survive this.  God Bless You All for any help you can provide! 

I will try to provide a Video Later (Not that computer savvy.. Have to figure it out lol) And definately Updates when Available. My next appointment is on October 2nd 2012 at the Shands Trauma Clinic in Gainsville Fl.

Any Money donated will be returned when I file my tax returns & receive my refund for the year! Thank you!

story:
The Impact

The BlueLight invention  is a product that Promotes Wellness. We perceive its impact to be worldwide and multidimensional.  We expect all strata of the society to benefit and specific segments  of the consumer market to benefit substantially. The hard to reach segments of the society with poor habits or economic and geographic accessibility reasons stand to benefit the most. The wellness minded populations will find the product the perfect companion to a successful oral care routine. 

Risks & Challenges

Every new enterprise is faced with risks and challenges and we are not immune from many. We are confident however that we have done the research and established a path to complete  our mission. The design and engineering team is seasoned with many years of experience in  building successful products. This stage of development, to complete all aspects of the industrial design that will enable us to manufacture the product,  is  well planned and the outcome is certain given sufficient  financial support from our backers.

 We have investigated all aspects of marketing, manufacturing  and distribution. We have evaluated the financial and commercial risks and  we believe they are manageable. Our strength is derived from the broad experience of the startup team and the deep science knowledge of the  key aspects of the invention . We are the inventors. Our partnership with the  Forsyth institute gives us the strength to  continue our quest to expand the application and knowledge of the  invention.  Our CSO is an accomplished scientist and entrepreneur. He has led similar projects before  successfully . The CEO is a leader in the field of Photomedicine. 

We can not foresee the market or political uncertainties but we judge that the commercial opportunity is significant and the benefits to the consumer community substantial. Our efforts are powered by this knowledge and are positive  in the enterprise's success. Join us in our quest and BACK the project.

Disclosure

The Photomedics BlueLight is not a laser. The statements made on this website have not been evaluated by the FDA (U.S. Food & Drug Administration). This product is not intended to diagnose, cure, or prevent any disease. The information provided by this website or this company is not a substitute for a face-to-face consultation with your physician and should not be construed as individual medical advice.

story:
the DEO story

stripped: DEO, inspired by the ‘science’ of lip balms & sunscreens, is a super-effective deodorant by means of its serious staying power and the patented porous silver* in it.

This DEO is stripped of all things that are not necessary; chemicals, fragrances, alcohol, aluminium, salt, baking soda, essential oils, animal testing, etc. DEO is an all natural, vegan, unisex deodorant formulated to keep your underarms – and the like – odour-free.

It is designed to naturally combat bacteria that causes body odour in the first place, instead of just masking it. It is effective for 2 to 5 days, even with showers in between, and the active ingredients are all natural and earth-friendly. We don’t compromise on this, and neither should you.

stripped: DEO adheres effortlessly by applying a small pea-size amount to your underarms and rubs into your skin without any residue. DEO stays on your skin, not your clothes.

*not to be confused with nano or colloidal silver which both have some dubious connotations.

 

 

what's in DEO

The nine ingredients in this compact, powerful DEO are:

  • patented ecocert silver,
  • organic castor oil,
  • organic shea butter,
  • organic almond oil,
  • zinc oxide (non-nano),
  • bentonite clay,
  • hydrogenated castor oil,
  • sorbitane olivate (ecocert certified and cosmos approved), and
  • sustainable vegetable glycerine. 

See more information in our FAQs for questions on how to use our DEO, the silver used, the chosen packaging, the ingredients' specific role in the lotion, etc.

 

 

feedback about DEO

We have done several batches of samples to various testers and we've had a tremendously positive response. Below are some comments from our testers (see more reviews on our Facebook page):

 

 

DEO samples that were given to testers

 

 

what DEO needs and what's in it for you

We need your backing simply because of minimum order quantities with suppliers. We have made and tested samples with actual humans, so we have a working and proven formulation; we just need a funding push to get to the mass-manufacturing stage.

The funds received from your generous backing will go towards:

  • formulation refinement,
  • bulk manufacturing of packaging,
  • bulk lotion manufacture and packaging of the actual product,
  • the means to refine our existing website, distribution and shipping strategy to bring our DEO to every armpit across the world.

The timeline for the project is as follows:​

 

 

DEO risks & challenges

We have worked hard to formulate a super-effective natural deodorant that is good for you. We have already created the first two batches of samples and our testers have loved the product.

stripped: DEO is confident to start production with already existing partners and suppliers, giving us the ability to scale up as soon as we can secure the funding from you.

Of course, there may be unforeseeable issues that arise in production or distribution of the rewards, but we have a great team working to ensure that the products will reach your door as quickly as possible. And we will keep you in the loop every step of the way.

Please note, even if we don't reach our full target, we will still fulfil orders by other means, eg. package the already proven DEO into a glass jar and ship it to you. So either way, you will get your product ♥

 

 

DEO perks summary

 

DEO referral reward - get an extra DEO, for free!

(Note: A maximum of 2 free tubes per referrer)

 

 

why DEO chose plastic tubes

Our plastic tubes & caps can be recycled with normal plastic containers and the packaging it gets shipped in are hard-walled kraft paper tubes which effectively, but sustainably, protects it whilst making its way to you across the world.

stripped DEO thought about using biodegradable plastic, but it turned out it’s not as sustainable as you’d think. Biodegradable plastic is as of now extremely hard to recycle and if it ends up in the regular plastic waste stream, it could possibly cause problems for that whole batch which would usually be recycled without any problem.

Sugarcane tubes was also an option. However, it is not readily accessible in South Africa yet, meaning having to import it would just increase the CO2 emissions that you were saving by using them in the first place. Added to this, they are also not biodegradable, so they have to be recycled with plastic in any event.

And lastly, we also considered glass jars but having to take stripped: DEO out with your fingers would result in bacteria getting in contact with the cream and contaminating it, making it a risk to use. We don’t want to take that risk in a mass market, we have to have everyone’s best interests at heart.

We always keep an eye on the latest developments in the bioplastics field, and as soon as there’s a promising invention or readily accessibility to it in South Africa, we’ll be the first to give it a go!

 

 

shipping info

We're offering shipping to anywhere* in the world that a post-office can deliver to.

A small additional fee is charged at the checkout for shipping: 

  • South African backers - $3 (approximately R45)
  • International backers - $7

Your parcel will be sent with registered post and should arrive at your door within a week of dispatch inside South Africa and within two to three weeks internationally.

*our international backers are responsible for import duties, taxes and other charges. These costs are not included in the reward levels or shipping fees.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love the idea of DEO as much as we do, please help us get it to your friends too. Use the tools provided (on top of the page, next to the main picture) to share the campaign or simply copy our project link and post it on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

 

Check us out on social media:

 

FACEBOOK | INSTAGRAM | PINTEREST
story_txt:
the DEO story
stripped: DEO, inspired by the ‘science’ of lip balms & sunscreens, is a super-effective deodorant by means of its serious staying power and the patented porous silver* in it.
This DEO is stripped of all things that are not necessary; chemicals, fragrances, alcohol, aluminium, salt, baking soda, essential oils, animal testing, etc. DEO is an all natural, vegan, unisex deodorant formulated to keep your underarms – and the like – odour-free.
It is designed to naturally combat bacteria that causes body odour in the first place, instead of just masking it. It is effective for 2 to 5 days, even with showers in between, and the active ingredients are all natural and earth-friendly. We don’t compromise on this, and neither should you.
stripped: DEO adheres effortlessly by applying a small pea-size amount to your underarms and rubs into your skin without any residue. DEO stays on your skin, not your clothes.
*not to be confused with nano or colloidal silver which both have some dubious connotations.

 

 
what's in DEO
The nine ingredients in this compact, powerful DEO are:

patented ecocert silver,
organic castor oil,
organic shea butter,
organic almond oil,
zinc oxide (non-nano),
bentonite clay,
hydrogenated castor oil,
sorbitane olivate (ecocert certified and cosmos approved), and
sustainable vegetable glycerine. 

See more information in our FAQs for questions on how to use our DEO, the silver used, the chosen packaging, the ingredients' specific role in the lotion, etc.

 

 
feedback about DEO
We have done several batches of samples to various testers and we've had a tremendously positive response. Below are some comments from our testers (see more reviews on our Facebook page):

 

 
DEO samples that were given to testers

 


 
what DEO needs and what's in it for you
We need your backing simply because of minimum order quantities with suppliers. We have made and tested samples with actual humans, so we have a working and proven formulation; we just need a funding push to get to the mass-manufacturing stage.
The funds received from your generous backing will go towards:

formulation refinement,
bulk manufacturing of packaging,
bulk lotion manufacture and packaging of the actual product,
the means to refine our existing website, distribution and shipping strategy to bring our DEO to every armpit across the world.

The timeline for the project is as follows:​

 

 

DEO risks & challenges
We have worked hard to formulate a super-effective natural deodorant that is good for you. We have already created the first two batches of samples and our testers have loved the product.
stripped: DEO is confident to start production with already existing partners and suppliers, giving us the ability to scale up as soon as we can secure the funding from you.

story:
Für Deutsch klick hier

If you're trying to fit exercise into a busy day, it often requires taking gym gear to work, a meeting or to a restaurant. Therefore I designed a new backpack, which is because of its sleek and sporty design and many useful functions, suitable for sport and work.

And this in the highest quality down to the smallest detail.

In fact, each individual fabric and material was chosen from the standpoint of durability and performance. Not the price decides on the selection, only the quality, including YKK® zippers, Fidlock® and Duraflex® hardware and ballistic and ripstop nylon fabrics.

 

Video Review

 
The bag reviewer Chase Reeves takes a closer look at the DAYFARER in a entertaining 3rd party review.
 

 

 

 

FEATURES:

 

 

 

 

 

To make sure that the DAYFARER is durable and will last, I used only the highest grade materials. Each individual fabric and material is chosen from the standpoint of durability and performance.

 

 

Main features:

• 1680D ballistic nylon with a water repellent coating exterior
• Separate padded compartment 
• Ventilates shoe compartment 
• Spacious main compartment 
• Quick-access pockets 
• Interior pockets 
• Front pocket 
• Expandable water bottle pocket 
• Padded mesh back panel and shoulder straps 
• Ripstop Nylon lining

Dimensions: 
45 cm / 30 cm / 18 cm
18" / 12" / 7"

Weight: 
1088g
2.4 lbs

Volume:
18L - 22L

 

CONTACT:

If you have any further questions, an improvement proposal or you just want to chat about the DAYFARER, please feel free to contact me at info@farerdesign.com and I will get back to you ASAP.

 

 

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped over 5,000 creators make their projects a reality.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS:

What size of laptop can fit?
The DAYFARER is designed to fit any Laptop up to a 15".

What shoe size fit?
The DAYFARER can fit up to men's size 47,5 (13) shoes.

Where are the backpacks manufactured?
The DAYFARER backpack will be manufactured in Vietnam. This manufacturer specializes in the elaborate front-end development and is therefore perfect for my project.

Where can i get more informations about the developing process?
Check out the blog on my website https://farerdesign.com where i have documented the entire development process.

Shipping:
Your order will be handled by DHL or UPS up to entry of your country. 
Once your order enters your country, it will be handed off to your local post office for the final delivery. 
For international shipments outside the EU, please be aware that covering possible import, duty, VAT, and customs charges will be the buyers responsibility.

story:
We are proud to announce the Get It Back, a device designed specifically to solve an old problem in skydiving: canopies being lost after having to cut them away.










What We Need the Funding For

We have a fully engineered product, working prototypes, and a software back-end that's ready to go.  We need your help to take our prototype into mass production.

For us to be able to have these devices manufactured at a price low enough to make them affordable, we have to make them in production runs of at least 1,000 units. This is partly due to how electronic assembly factories operate; it is incredibly expensive to set up an assembly line and buy the initial tooling, but once the assembly line is going the units are fairly cheap to make. Therefore, the more we make at once, the cheaper the per-unit cost is.

The high costs of starting an assembly line, combined with the mandatory up-front FCC and Carrier fees, mean that we need at minimum funding level of $220,000 to start this operation.

While there are some low-volume production methods that can turn out devices in much smaller quantities (such as 3D printing), their per-unit cost is so high that they would be completely unaffordable, even by comparison to a sport as expensive as skydiving. (The working prototype devices pictured here, and that you may have seen us display at Summerfest, cost us over $400/ea just to manufacture!)

What will the final product cost

Because the Get It Back is essentially a miniaturized cell phone and communicates via the cellular network, it does require a subscription.  While we are offering very steep discounts to our IndieGoGo backers, and the eventual retail price will be $169 per device, plus a $99/year subscription fee.

Exclusively on IndieGoGo we are offering a Lifetime Subscriptions, which we will NOT be making available after our initial funding campaign.

Why is there a subscription fee?

Because the combination of GPS and cellular is one of the things that makes the Get it Back so special. It has a cellular transmitter that we have to keep hooked to a provider and pay for every year. It makes it usable almost anywhere in the world that has at least 2G or 3G service. We have agreements with about 130 other countries and there is never a roaming fee. Keep in mind that this considerably cheaper than most GPS trackers on the market now, including the ones for pets, and most of those do not include roaming options. 

What happens if we don't get funded?

I, Taneva Baker, have personally funded all of the R&D myself. I nor the company have any debt whatsoever, so in the unfortunate event that we can get the funds to  go to production, then you will get a full refund through Indiegogo minus %5 for the fees that we loose. You get to keep the awesome swag ;) 

Please keep in mind that we are working on some larger contracts, including some military contracts, that won't show up on the Indiegogo page. Just because the Indiegogo page is slow, doesn't mean that we won't get funded. We will keep funders up to date with any exciting news!! 

What happens if your company closes after we receive our products? Does the Get it Back become obsolete?

If we get through manufacturing and get the product out to consumers, it's actually very easy for us to keep the devices connected to the network. So even if we close the doors, as long as you pay the yearly bill we can pay the carriers to keep the device connected from our end. We invested a huge chunk of time and money into a back-end system that would, in the event that we had to stop manufacturing devices, would take care of itself, with minimal input from myself or Brendan. 

Yes there is a risk to being an early adapter, but we tried to make it as minimal as possible for the consumers. I feel like it's my personal reputation on the line here with my community and family of skydivers if we let you down. Not just money.

Stretch Goals

If we can raise more money, we've got some excellent stretch goals that we'd be thrilled to hit:

$270,000 - Native iOS and Android apps

Our current tracking solution utilizes a "web-app", a web page that acts like an app on your phone.  This is a flexible design, but we'd love to raise enough funds for native iOS and Android apps (that would be available for free in the iTunes and Google Play stores).

$1,000,000 - Reduced lifetime subscription costs

This would require that we pre-sell almost 5,000 Get It Backs, and having that many devices to build would give us immense negotiating power with our producers for the initial production run to drive costs even lower.  We would be able to offer all Indiegogo backers lifetime discounted subscriptions of $69/year.  Please share our campaign with all of your friends (even the wuffos) so we can make this stretch goal a reality!


Development History

The Get It Back started life the way many hobby electronic projects do; with an Arduino and a pile of parts soldered together by hand. 

While this initial device was far too large to be usable in the skydiving world, it was effective in providing a basic test platform to begin developing software and testing out ideas.  The lessons learned with this initial device were immensely useful and gave us a lot of direction when we started down the path of miniaturizing a device ready for industrial production.

While cramming the required electronics into a package small enough to fit on a riser was a complicated enough, the biggest challenge has been in designing an activation method that allows the Get It Back to automatically detect a cutaway with absolutely zero effort required by the user.  We went through dozens of different activation methods before settling on one of the simplest, which makes use of existing skydiving materials and methods.

An activation lanyard, made of the exact same cord that your cutaway system uses, is attached to your harness with a traditional C-clip in any location you please, preferably near the base of the 3-ring system.  This lanyard is fed up into a sleeve slid over your front riser that holds the Get It Back device, along with its antenna and battery pack. 

When the cut-away handle is pulled and the three-ring system is released, this lanyard is pulled out of the battery pack, activating the device which begins transmitting it's location long before the canopy has even reached the ground.

Risks & Challenges

Our largest risk with this project is that the skydiving market isn't large enough to support the up-front costs of manufacturing a custom-engineered device for an extremely niche application. Help us prove that the skydiving world is big enough, and that everyone is tired enough of losing canopies!

How You Can Help

Pre-order a device, and tell your skydiving friends!  Heck, tell your wuffo friends too!  While we've designed this device explicitly for skydivers, we'd love to see what other creative uses people can come up with for such a small, flexible and unique tracking device.

story:
Save the earth, get yourself or a family member/friend a gift to remember, support natural health research...it's all in a day's work! For each Pennsylvania 100% Soy Wax Candle that is purchased, 50% of profit will go towards the Natural Health Research Institute (NHRI) and their Tackling Cystic Fibrosis Initiative which supports indepdendent research grants for fighting Cystic Fibrosis via natural means. Earth friendly and biodegradable, these specially labelled "Hope" Candles make wonderful gifts for family and friends, or even yourself.

Anyways, the point is please consider buying one of these exquisite candles, just donating out of the goodness of your heart or..checking out some of our other perks available that includes a Private In Home Violin Concert.

Directions: Please scroll down past this description to select one of five perks you would like with your contribution. After clicking directly on the perk, you will be taken to a method of payment.

To Learn More About Our Cause Please Visit:  

www.naturalhealthresearch.org

story:
Obscenities are among the earliest recorded attestations of almost any language on the planet. Even old poetry, combining lofty lyrics with brutally obscene words, was extremely widespread…

…and for a good reason.

Do you know there’s pure healing magic in properly shaped sacral swearwords – especially in Russian ones, also known as “MAT”?

Phonosemantics studies prove that. Harvard Labs has more to say about that, too.

  • You can vent or express joy, anger or happiness
  • You can blow off steam and take the pressure off, and also instantly feel good (and impress your friends)

The secret is now uncovered, and our team needs your help for making the TRUE power or sacral swearwords readily available to English-speaking world.

We’ve distilled the really powerful stuff (that very few people ever heard of) from rude profanity and are aiming at making the sacred knowledge available in English-speaking world…

…at least in libraries where everyone can have free access to it.

We’re launching the ancient knowledge, conveying ever new shades of meaning to the words - and accumulating all new phenomena of life – into press and then into libraries.

There’re an estimated 121,169 libraries of all kinds in the United States alone, and we aim to deliver our practical studies (in book format) to at least 25% of these libraries, that's like 30,292 of them.

How will YOU benefit from this?

Though “MAT” is used in gigantic proportion by everyone (by lots of people!), the widely used “four letter word(s)” do NOT have the healing power… and don't sound as "home-run" as their Russian versions.

In nature, nothing is ever black-and-white.

Time and time again we discover that things we thought were unequivocally unhealthy—like germs or UV rays—can sometimes be quite good.

And now researchers are beginning to find that the same is true of our habits and personality quirks.

"In certain situations, what is typically a detrimental trait can turn out to be a good one," says Bryan Gibson, PhD, professor of social psychology at Central Michigan University.

In other words, what you perceive as faults — even minor ones like blurting out curse words when things go wrong — can, in the right context, be strengths.

Here's why. 

What Harvard scientists say about swearing?


The old thinking: Swearing is trashy. (Just picture The Real Housewives of Atlanta.) 

The new wisdom: Using your favorite four-letter word at the right time can alleviate pain.

A recent study published in NeuroReport found that participants who immersed their hands in icy water and were allowed to shout expletives experienced significantly less prickly, numbing pain than when they repeated neutral words. Researchers speculate that cursing activates the stress response, boosting the body's pain threshold to deal with crisis.

The old thinking: Getting angry is unhealthy because it raises blood pressure (hence expressions like "that makes my blood boil"). 

The new wisdom: As long as your anger problems aren't chronic, getting mad when you face an unfair situation can actually buffer stress.

According to Jennifer Lerner, PhD, director of the Harvard Decision Science Laboratory, outrage stems from feeling wronged. Reacting with controlled anger (and proper swearwords!) rather than runaway anxiety releases less of the body's stress hormone cortisol—too much of which has been linked to bone loss, depression, and obesity.

There is a certain four-letter word that evokes much emotion, is often uttered by mothers giving birth, and whose usage by humans is thought to be evolutionarily adaptive: f___!

According to a new study by British researchers, saying the F word or any other commonly used expletive can work to reduce physical pain — and it seems that people may use curse words by instinct.

Indeed, as any owner of a banged shin, whacked funny bone or stubbed toe knows, dancing the agony jig — and shouting its profane theme tune — are about as automatic as the response to a doctor's reflex hammer.

A shocking Keele University Experiment on Cursing

To figure out why, psychologists at Britain's Keele University recruited 64 college students and asked them to stick their hands in a bucket of ice water and endure the pain for several minutes.

One group was allowed to repeat a curse word of their choice continuously while their hands were in the water; another group was asked to repeat a non-expletive control word, such as that which might be used to describe a table.

The result was that swearing not only allowed students to withstand the discomfort longer, but also reduced their perception of pain intensity.

Curse words, the study found, help you cope.

"Swearing increases your pain tolerance," says Richard Stephens, a psychologist and lead author of the study, which was published this week in the journal NeuroReport. 

Although the experiment's initial hypothesis was inspired by anecdotal evidence from some pain researchers that swearing was actually a maladaptive behavior that served only to make things worse, Stephens' findings showed exactly the opposite.

Want more proof?

"The No. 1 priority is to make the pain go away. If swearing made the pain worse, that would be illogical," Stephens says, adding that you hardly need a scientific study to bear out the theory.

It was an everyday incident in his backyard that first piqued Stephens' fascination with cursing. While building a shed in his garden, he accidentally hammered his little finger.

"I whacked my hand really, really hard," he says, "and while it was throbbing, I swore a bit." Being a psychologist, of course that got him thinking, Why did I react in that way?

Later, he witnessed his wife do the same thing while giving birth to their daughter — at moments of intense pain, she would holler expletives. "She immediately apologized," he remembers, "but the medical staff said, 'Don't apologize! We get this all the time.' "

That's because humans are hardwired to swear cathartically, says Steven Pinker, a Harvard psychologist and author of The Stuff of Thought, an exploration of the psychology of language.

Pinker distinguishes cathartic cursing from using profanity descriptively, idiomatically, abusively or for emphasis, and points to similar behavior in animals that suggests its evolutionary roots. If you step on a dog or cat's tail, it will let out a sharp yelp of pain, for example.

"Swearing probably comes from a very primitive reflex that evolved in animals," Pinker says. "In humans, our vocal tract has been hijacked by our language skills," so instead of barking out a random sound, "we articulate our yelp with a word colored with emotion."

Now you see WHYnothing alleviates pain
more than distilled, multi-faceted “Russian Mat” (Outperforming Enlgish words 10 to 1)?

This has to do with phonosemantics, but we won’t bore you to death with this stuff.

As you see, the part of the brain that accounts for the urge to swear — or yelp, in the case of animals — is deep within, suggesting its primitiveness.

Studies of non-human primates show that vocalization is nearly always attributed to subcortical processes in the brain, in those regions that control primal, raw emotions, says Diana Van Lancker Sidtis, a professor of speech language pathology and audiology at New York University.

In humans too, the urge to swear likely stems from primitive parts, but it is usually overridden by commands from the brain's more complex cortex — the abundant gray matter on which humans rely for language and reason, among other sophisticated abilities.

"We have intact frontal lobes, which inhibit these responses," Sidtis explains. But in certain circumstances — either because we don't bother to inhibit them or because the shock of pain or discomfort momentarily surpasses the safeguards — our impulse for obscenity takes over. "In that way, it's like the dog when you step on his tail," Sidtis says.

A word of caution!

It may be that swearing serves as an alarm bell, triggering the body's fight-or-flight response, as Stephens postulates in the study.

He and his colleagues found that when study participants used expletives, their heart rates were consistently higher than when they were repeating non-obscene control words — a physiological response that is consistent with fight or flight.

But while it is typically fear that triggers the stress response, Stephens suggests the salient emotion in this case is not fear but aggression.

"In swearing, people have an emotional response, and it's the emotional response that actually triggers the reduction of pain," says Stephens, whose next step is to research the relationship between induced aggression and reduction of pain.

But before you go yelling “Russian mat” words at every turn, consider this: in Stephens' study, swearing reduced the perception of pain more strongly in women than in men. That may be because in daily life "men swear more than women," says Pinker, which could have the unfortunate side effect of dulling the natural painkiller. "

“For women I suspect that swearing retains more of an emotional punch because it has not been overused,” he says.

"That's one of the reasons that I think people should not overuse profanity in their speech and writing," says Pinker. "That's not because I'm a prude, but because it blunts swear words of their power when you do need them. You should save them for just the right occasions."

What do you get from all this?

As you see, I’m not promoting cursing as an universal answer to just about every situation.

Studies and experiments show that Russian Mat dramatically outperforms English cursing 10 to 1, and this Indiegogo project serves at least 2 purposes.

  1. I want people to have the raw power of Russian sacral swearwords available
  2. I aim to reduce the amount of hypocrisy regarding profanity in general. What if you could say just 3 or 4 words, nobody but the most advanced dudes know what these words mean… and you instantly feel GREAT and take proper, laser focused, perfect action right away?

That’s how powerful Russian Mat is.

Proven by science. As seen on TV :-)

What’s done already?

We’ve finished the studies and made the 1st step towards creating the Unholy Bible of the 21st century.

We’re registered the title and got the codes:

ISBN-13: 978-1484121863 

ISBN-10: 1484121864 

Here’s how YOU can help!

To cover bills for editing, proofreading and translating into English our practical “Russian Mat” guidebook, we need $17,400.

Delivering the book (and accompanying MP3 files) to majority or libraries in the US will take 121,169 * $13.80 = $1,672,132.2

But we have a bit smaller distribution than president Obama’s campaign… and set realistic goal of delivering the book to at least 25% of these libraries, that’s 30,292 of them.

30,292 * $13.80 = $418,030

To start things off,  we’ve lowered the threshold to just 5% of the libraries because I’m certain we’ll have better terms from the publisher once we hit that mark.

5% of the libraries is just 6058, and

6058 * $13.80 = $83,607

$17,400 plus $83,607 gives us $101,007 for making English-speaking world a better place to live for everyone, including YOU.

We won’t stop there and will spread the Russian Mat book to more libraries and to  other countries once we get better terms from the publisher and get media coverage.

With your help, reaching this bold goal will be much more fast…

…and fun for YOU. Here’s how!

This book project will stay in libraries forever.

Your help could put YOUR name in history! So one move towards the big, great, hairy, audacious goal is worth a thousand swear words.

I would appreciate if you help me and the team fund this project.

Please contribute now!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, we understand… but please share this link with your friends, be it by e-mail, Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Reddit, etc.

Thank you so much!

Obscenities are among the earliest recorded attestations of almost any language on the planet. Even old poetry, combining lofty lyrics with brutally obscene words, was extremely widespread…
…and for a good reason.
Do you know there’s pure healing magic in properly shaped sacral swearwords – especially in Russian ones, also known as “MAT”?
Phonosemantics studies prove that. Harvard Labs has more to say about that, too.

You can vent or express joy, anger or happiness
You can blow off steam and take the pressure off, and also instantly feel good (and impress your friends)
The secret is now uncovered, and our team needs your help for making the TRUE power or sacral swearwords readily available to English-speaking world.
We’ve distilled the really powerful stuff (that very few people ever heard of) from rude profanity and are aiming at making the sacred knowledge available in English-speaking world…
…at least in libraries where everyone can have free access to it.
We’re launching the ancient knowledge, conveying ever new shades of meaning to the words - and accumulating all new phenomena of life – into press and then into libraries.
There’re an estimated 121,169 libraries of all kinds in the United States alone, and we aim to deliver our practical studies (in book format) to at least 25% of these libraries, that's like 30,292 of them.
How will YOU benefit from this?
Though “MAT” is used in gigantic proportion by everyone (by lots of people!), the widely used “four letter word(s)” do NOT have the healing power… and don't sound as "home-run" as their Russian versions.
In nature, nothing is ever black-and-white.
Time and time again we discover that things we thought were unequivocally unhealthy—like germs or UV rays—can sometimes be quite good.

Reacting with controlled anger (and proper swearwords!) rather than runaway anxiety releases less of the body's stress hormone cortisol—too much of which has been linked to bone loss, depression, and obesity.

story:
Short Summary

We are friends of Robert 'Jungle' Jones who is a good friend to many and has a heart of gold.  For no reason, SOMEONE burned his camper to the ground.  Almost all of his belongings were in his camper.  He lost his Earnhardt collection, tools and most important to his heart, irreplaceable childhood photos of him and his deceased father.  We need your help to bring this man up out of his bad luck rut!  You will be helping a man in a time of need who would not ask for himself.  

 

What We Need & What You Get

Jungle Jones needs $5,000 to

1.)  pay off his old burnt to ashes camper ($300)

2.)  find and purchase another used camper/trailer ($1,500) guesstimate

3.)  replace his burnt to ashes clothes and belongings ($ unknown) waiting                     for OK from investigators to see what--if any--tools are salvageable.

4.)  Oh, get this...replace his transmission that is going in his Chevy truck ($1,300)

5.)  And there's more...pay for other needs like gas to get to the Dr.s because 3 days ago while at urgent care, they found 2 spots on his lungs!!! 

 At this time, we can offer you a heartfelt Thanks and for some of you a phone call or a signed Thank YOU note from the bottom of Robert 'Jungle' Jones heart<3.

 If we don’t reach our entire goal for our friend Jungle Jones, he will use the money donated towards the most important need first.  At this time, his truck repairs are imperative so he can get to the Dr.s.

The Impact

Supporting our campaign will give you the warm and fuzzies because you will have the personal knowledge that you helped someone you probably don't know and probably never will in his time of need--just because you can!

Other Ways You Can Help

Robert 'Jungle' Jones certainly understands some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

 Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our "Jungle Jones needs your help" campaign.

Reminder...use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.  Thank you for any time you have taken to help our friend.

story:
The Diaper Drop was born...

out of our own family's needs. I grew up  in a home that didn't have a washer or dryer, much food or a father. It was mom and us kids. We struggled just to meet the daily basic needs for our little brothers and sisters. There were 11 siblings plus myself. I know the pain of not having the fundamentals for everyday survival, this wreaks havoc on a family and this was without a hurricane...
 
We had a "Love net" though our church and our neighbors helped us get through tuff times, with donations of food clothing and lots of hugs. I made a promise, when I had the resources I would give back to allieviate some pain of those in need. 
 
My oldest daughter had her first baby at fifteen and as Hilary Clinton said "It takes a villiage to raise a child" 6 more followed fast and furiously. The needs were mostly diapers, obviously. Then I met a man, who created a website (http://www.dropopp.com/home/DiaperDrop.aspx). He had an idea to send my daughter diapers from the site, since we lived out of state. This was easier than sending money and made sure the need was met. It also enabled us to see how the website worked and if others could do the same. History was made and the Diaper Drop was born.
 
Seeing a greater need, and the devestation that Hurricane Sandy has brought to the East Coast, we bring the Diaper Drop to the people that need a "Love Net". Thanks to Indiegogo its easy for everyone to pitch in. One of our basic human needs, is to be a part of something greater than ourselves, and by working together as a community we can create healing and have the collective power to change things.
 
How we gonna do this?
 
We thought about stuffing a truck with diapers and driving it up to New York from Mississippi, while collecting diapers along the way, but the money and time were big issues. So we decided to use the Indiegogo site as our platfrom. We are asking YOU the community to partner with us by donating the funds. We will purchase the diapers from the closest Walmart's in the heavy struck areas of New York and get them to the families. This will reduce the cost of shipping, moving a truck/gas/food/ lodging and all other expenses, to get more diapers for your buck$$.
 
How will your dollars be put to work?
 
When we reach our goal, the two of will us fly to New York (on our dime) and rent a truck in the area. Then purchase the diaper and baby needs, fill up the truck and with the help of the local Television & radio news stations get the word out. We will have appointed days, times and locations for distributions so that the people can get to us. If not we will drive to them. "Come hell or high water we will do this" 
 
The whole country is getting involved in helping rebuild the communities that have been devastated by Sandy's fury. It will take a villiage and all of us as neighbors, no matter how many miles apart can help. We start at the bottom (the baby's bottoms) and work our way up!

You can also help...

Put together your own campaign and or Diaper Drive. Anyone can do it, it just takes a vison, people who are willing and a need (not lacking here). Also you can Share this campaign on your social networks...Thanks!
 
 
Giving is like a virus, it's catchy.

story:
THINGS THAT MAKE THIS CAMPAIGN UNIQUE:

  1. Faith Fit USA is the first organization that is solely dedicated to resolving the direct correlation between being overweight and being Christian.

  2. Each of our perks can and will DIRECTLY improve your quality of life, the quality of life of someone you know, or the quality of life of the members of your church.

  3. Your contributions will result in a positive change in the lives and health of Christians.

 

The Christian Expectation:

"Do you not know that your bodies are temples of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own; you were bought at a price. Therefore honor God with your bodies."

1 Corinthians 6:19-20

 

What is Really Happening:

Nearly one-half of the American population will be OBESE by 2030 according to a  2012 study published in the American Journal of Preventive Medicine... Not overweight... OBESE!

It Gets Worse...

A 2006 Purdue study found that the fundamental Christians are by far the  heaviest of all religious groups led by the Baptists with a 30% obesity rate, compared with Jews at 1%, Buddhists and Hindus at 0.7%.

And Worse...

A 2011 Northwestern University study tracking 3,433 men and women for 18 years  found that young adults who attend church or a bible study once a week are 50%  more likely to be obese.

And Worse...

The Pawtucket Heart Health Program found that people who attended church were  more likely than non-church members to be 20 percent overweight and have higher  cholesterol and blood pressure numbers.

 

What is the solution for the obesity epidemic in the church?...

 

That's Simple:  The Church.


But What Do Church Leaders Know About Fitness and Weight Loss?

As it turns out...NOT MUCH! 

That is why we are working 24/7 to launch Faith

Fit USA, so that we can provide every church with

the resources that they need to promote physical

and spiritual health!

 

What Is Faith Fit USA?

Faith Fit USA is a company that utilizes a unique fusion of spiritual faith and physical fitness in order to offer a fitness solution that achieves astounding results. Research provides that by adding the element of faith to diet and exercise, one is three times more likely to achieve their physical goals. Faith Fit USA is hoping to help the millions of Christians who are struggling with their weight by reaching out to those who are seeking more than a workout.

 

What Does Faith Fit USA OFFER?

  • Complete Faith Fit University For Any Church To Offer It's Members

  • Original Faith Based Fitness Boot Camps Held At Any Church

  • Revolutionary F.L.O.A.T. Training System To Transform Anyone's Body and Spirit

  • Massive Faith Fit Life Management Online Member Resources Center

  • Access To Our Personal Trainers 24/7 In The Community Forum

  • Daily Motivational Emails Chalk Full Of Informative Fit Tips, and Recipes

  • Weekly Workout And Diet Plans Tailored To All Needs

  • Personal Online Fitness Journal To Chronicle Your Journey

  • And much, much more...

 

Help Us Help People... And We'll Show

YOU Some Love Too!

Your contribution is going to go a long way toward helping us reach our goal, and thus, toward helping people change their lives for the better!  We simply can't put into words how awesome that makes us feel! (It should make you feel pretty great too!)

Therefore, we have put together some truly life changing perks for you to use for yourself, or to give to somebody that you care about.  Pretty cool huh?  Well..this is the least that we can do, and we know it...

That's why we are making the following promise to you right now...

We WILL always try our very best to make a Positive Difference.

We WILL never turn our backs on anyone who comes to us for help or advice.

We WILL Strive to represent our Christian Faith with dignity and respect.

And As Always,

We WILL Continue to give back to the communities and churches that need it most!

 

Where Will The Money Go?

Online Framework For The Faith Fit USA University ($12,250)

  • The current version of our Faith Fit Members Area has gained so much popularity that it is fast outgrowing it's simple roots.  We need servers, and a new website to keep up with our ever growing member community and knowledge base!  This enables us to help as many people as possible in a fast and effective way, no matter where they live.

 

Faith Fit USA Outreach Program ($10,000)

  • Every company needs a marketing department, and our marketing comes in the form of an outreach program.  Christians should know about this issue, so that they can confront it.  We want to educate  them about the perils of obesity, and we want them to know that they CAN turn to their church and their FAITH for help.

 

1,000 Hard Copies of the Faith Fit USA Camp Manual ($3,500)

  • The Faith Fit USA Camp Manual contains a turnkey faith based fitness solution that any church or community organization can offer to their members.  We give these to many churches and organizations that need them in order to help their congregations get fit.

 

Legal Fees For Setting Up Franchises Nationwide ($4,950)

  • That's right!  We want to offer professionally instructed Faith Fit Camps across the nation!  These will differ from the manual taught camps in that there will be a professionally trained faith fit leader for our franchised camps.

 

Taxes ($4,300)

  • You read it right... there are only a few things that are for certain in life... Death, Heaven, Love and TAXES!  We hope to take a small portion of our contributions and use them to subsidize the capital gains tax that we must pay for pre-selling our perks to you!  This may not be the most appealing notion in the world, but we want to be honest about where all of the money is going!

 

Grand Total: $35,000

(NOTE: This total is not reflected in our Indiegogo Campaign Goal.  This is because we wanted to set a more modest goal with the hope and faith that things will go really well!)

 

 

    • Contribute By Claiming A Perk That Will Help Improve Your Quality of Life!

 

    • If You Are Unable To Contribute, We Ask That You Please Share This Page With Your Friends!  (Use The Like Button!)

 

    • Pray For Us, So That Together We Can Make A Positive Difference!

 

 

WITH YOUR HELP WE WILL DEVELOP THE PERFECT CHRISTIAN SOLUTION TO GETTING FIT!

 

Words Cannot Express Our Gratitude... 

Thank You So Very Much For Your Time And Love!

 

Sincerely,

 

Skylar Webber and the Faith Fit USA Team
story_txt:
THINGS THAT MAKE THIS CAMPAIGN UNIQUE:


Faith Fit USA is the first organization that is solely dedicated to resolving the direct correlation between being overweight and being Christian.


Each of our perks can and will DIRECTLY improve your quality of life, the quality of life of someone you know, or the quality of life of the members of your church.


Your contributions will result in a positive change in the lives and health of Christians.


 
The Christian Expectation:
"Do you not know that your bodies are temples of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own; you were bought at a price. Therefore honor God with your bodies."
1 Corinthians 6:19-20 
 
What is Really Happening:
Nearly one-half of the American population will be OBESE by 2030 according to a  2012 study published in the American Journal of Preventive Medicine... Not overweight... OBESE!
It Gets Worse...
A 2006 Purdue study found that the fundamental Christians are by far the  heaviest of all religious groups led by the Baptists with a 30% obesity rate, compared with Jews at 1%, Buddhists and Hindus at 0.7%.
And Worse...
A 2011 Northwestern University study tracking 3,433 men and women for 18 years  found that young adults who attend church or a bible study once a week are 50%  more likely to be obese. 
And Worse...
The Pawtucket Heart Health Program found that people who attended church were  more likely than non-church members to be 20 percent overweight and have higher  cholesterol and blood pressure numbers.
 
What is the solution for the obesity epidemic in the church?...
 
That's Simple:  The Church.

But What Do Church Leaders Know About Fitness and Weight Loss?
As it turns out...NOT MUCH!  
That is why we are working 24/7 to launch Faith
 Fit USA, so that we can provide every church with
 the resources that they need to promote physical
 and spiritual health!
 
What Is Faith Fit USA? 
Faith Fit USA is a company that utilizes a unique fusion of spiritual faith and physical fitness in order to offer a fitness solution that achieves astounding results. Research provides that by adding the element of faith to diet and exercise, one is three times more likely to achieve their physical goals. Faith Fit USA is hoping to help the millions of Christians who are struggling with their weight by reaching out to those who are seeking more than a workout.
 
What Does Faith Fit USA OFFER?


Complete Faith Fit University For Any Church To Offer It's Members


Original Faith Based Fitness Boot Camps Held At Any Church


Revolutionary F.L.O.A.T. Training System To Transform Anyone's Body and Spirit


Massive Faith Fit Life Management Online Member Resources Center


Access To Our Personal Trainers 24/7 In The Community Forum


Daily Motivational Emails Chalk Full Of Informative Fit Tips, and Recipes


Weekly Workout And Diet Plans Tailored To All Needs


Personal Online Fitness Journal To Chronicle Your Journey




And much, much more...


 
Help Us Help People... And We'll Show
 YOU Some Love Too!
Your contribution is going to go a long way toward helping us reach our goal, and thus, toward helping people change their lives for the better!  We simply can't put into words how awesome that makes us feel! (It should make you feel pretty great too!)
Therefore, we have put together some truly life changing perks for you to use for yourself, or to give to somebody that you care about.  Pretty cool huh?  Well..this is the least that we can do, and we know it...
That's why we are making the following promise to you right now...
We WILL always try our very best to make a Positive Difference.
We WILL never turn our backs on anyone who comes to us for help or advice.
We WILL Strive to represent our Christian Faith with dignity and respect.
And As Always,
We WILL Continue to give back to the communities and churches that need it most!

 
Where Will The Money Go?
Online Framework For The Faith Fit USA University ($12,250)

The current version of our Faith Fit Members Area has gained so much popularity that it is fast outgrowing it's simple roots.  We need servers, and a new website to keep up with our ever growing member community and knowledge base!  This enables us to help as many people as possible in a fast and effective way, no matter where they live.

Every company needs a marketing department, and our marketing comes in the form of an outreach program.  Christians should know about this issue, so that they can confront it.  We want to educate  them about the perils of obesity, and we want them to know that they CAN turn to their church and their FAITH for help.

The Faith Fit USA Camp Manual contains a turnkey faith based fitness solution that any church or community organization can offer to their members.  We give these to many churches and organizations that need them in order to help their congregations get fit.

 
Legal Fees For Setting Up Franchises Nationwide ($4,950)

That's right!  We want to offer professionally instructed Faith Fit Camps across the nation!  These will differ from the manual taught camps in that there will be a professionally trained faith fit leader for our franchised camps.

 
Taxes ($4,300)

You read it right... there are only a few things that are for certain in life... Death, Heaven, Love and TAXES!  We hope to take a small portion of our contributions and use them to subsidize the capital gains tax that we must pay for pre-selling our perks to you!  This may not be the most appealing notion in the world, but we want to be honest about where all of the money is going!

 
Grand Total: $35,000
(NOTE: This total is not reflected in our Indiegogo Campaign Goal.  This is because we wanted to set a more modest goal with the hope and faith that things will go really well!)
 
 


Contribute By Claiming A Perk That Will Help Improve Your Quality of Life!


 


If You Are Unable To Contribute, We Ask That You Please Share This Page With Your Friends!  (Use The Like Button!)


 


Pray For Us, So That Together We Can Make A Positive Difference!


 
 
WITH YOUR HELP WE WILL DEVELOP THE PERFECT CHRISTIAN SOLUTION TO GETTING FIT!
 
Words Cannot Express Our Gratitude... 
Thank You So Very Much For Your Time And Love!
 
Sincerely,
 
Skylar Webber and the Faith Fit USA Team

story:
Who we are

Kik Soccer is a company developed with the worlds greater good in mind. We have been to Africa and seen the effects soccer can have, and we want to use that to help others. We view social responsibility as an obligation, not a burden.

For every soccer ball we sell, we also give one away. Since a kid can't, or shouldn't, eat a soccer ball, we also donate enough money to the World Food Programme to provide 8 meals for children. 

What We Need and What You Get

We are raising $10,000 to place our first large order of kik brand soccer balls. The best part is that your not only helping us with our order, but your getting an awesome soccer ball to show off to your friends. You'll also be giving a ball away to a child in need. We at kik soccer call that a win, win, win.

We are offering a full lineup of top quality balls for players on all levels. All of our balls include a full 2 year guarantee. Here's a quick overview of our offering:

Prime Training Ball - Sizes 3, 4, and 5
Prime is a great every day ball for coaches, parents, and players looking for a great training ball for players of all ages.
Hand-Sewn 32 Panel, Leatherite Shine, 4-Layer, Latex Bladder

Strife Match Ball - Size 5
Strife is the ideal match ball. A great ball for players who already know the game and who are looking for a responsive soft-touch ball.
Hand-Sewn 32 Panel, Ducksung PU Leather, 4-Layer, Latex Bladder

Conquer Premier FIFA Ball - Size 5
The Conquer is a professional level ball for play-makers. Only for people who want the best in true-flight and touch.
Hand-Sewn 32 Panel, Cordley, 4-Layer, Latex Bladder, FIFA-Approved Ball

 
Because this is our first order, its going to take a little bit to get balls rolling. We have to design the balls, get them manufactured, and finally shipped. From the date of our first order, you should have the ball in hand in 15 weeks. It sounds like a while, but it's only because it's our first order. We'll have stock on hand in the future to fulfill all incoming orders.

In the event we are unable to reach our goal of $10,000, we will only order enough balls for the current demand. For example, say we raise $5,000. We would order all the balls guaranteed with our perks system, including the soccer balls we will give away. We would also still donate money for every ball to the World Food Programme. So it's still a win, win, win for everyone.

If we exceed our goal, we will use the extra money to purchase a larger quantity of soccer balls. This will reduce our cost directly as we get volume discounts. We will also use a portion of any extra money to air frieght our initial order. This will shorten our time to market 4-5 weeks. That's pretty huge.

The Impact

By pledging your support and reserving your kik soccer ball today, you are also providing us with balls to give away immediately. This will help us and our partner non-profit organizations, Sport Against Poverty and PeacePassers.Org, be able to start giving balls away immediately to begin making an impact right away.

Soccer is the worlds most popular sport. Millions of children play it everyday, the problem is they play barefoot and with rocks. By giving away soccer balls as a business model, we are giving these kids an opportunity they would not otherwise have. This outreach can be used to encourage team work, confidence, physical condition, and overall well being, with the end result being giving these kids more opportunities on and off the field. 

Most of the kids we deal with also have severe poverty issues that do not give them access to the meals they need. By partnering with the World Food Program, we are doing as much as we can to make sure these kids do not go hungry, and can play the game they love for many years to come.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? That's fine, we understand. We appreciate you just taking the time to check us out. There are a few other easy, and free ways you can get involved. We are a new company, and not very many people know about us. Indiegogo has some great tools to help you spread the word about us. Share us on Facebook and Twitter, or if you know any bloggers, writers, soccer coaches, Santa Claus, or Lionel Messi, let them know about us!

story:
Please Help Stefphanie Beat Breast Cancer Burden Free!

On March 12, 2012 Stefphani was diagnosed with Stage 3 Breast Cancer. Only 24 years old and a single mom she endured three months of harsh chemotherapy and since recording this video had both breasts removed. When diagnosed she suddenly had to leave her job to begin 9-10 hour chemo treatments. The loss of income caused an extreme financial burden which resulted in her exhausting all her savings. Our goal is to help relieve her of the financial burden and stress that could hender her healing process and full recovery. 

What We Need

Your suport will help cover her basic living expenses over the next six months while she recovers from the bilateral mastectomy, breast reconstruction, and multiple post operative procedures to come (Radiation included). It will be used to pay her rent, utlities, balances on medical bills, and give her the peace of mind of not having to uproot her daughter from their home while she is healing. Overall her modest lifestye only requires funds specifically for the following expenses:  

  • Rent
  • Utilities
  • Phone
  • Dr. Visit & Prescription Co-Pays / Existing Medical Bills 
  • Clothing and School Supplies for her daughter

The Impact

For such a young woman having little to no family financial support Stefphanie has shown tremendous strength and courage throughout her ordeal. She is a true survivor and is looking forward to using her experience to help:    

  • young women with breast cancer understand the challenges they may face strictly because of their age
  • young mothers identify sources of support they may not realize exist
  • spanish speaking women navigate through the confusing medical maze 
  • english speaking physicians better relate to spanish speaking patients. 

We are friends of Stefph's and we appreciate any amount you can give. I am a two time breast cancer survivor myself and have mentored Stefph and many other women through their diagnosis. I know there is life after breast cancer and your help will give Stefph the hand up she needs to get well and live her life to the fullest!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute at this time we understad, but you can help us when you:

  • Spread the word and share the link
  • Ask others to give to this campaign

Thank You!

Delores and Friends of Stefph

story:
Our objective:

     To create an outdoor space that will function as a nurturing environment for the community. The park will offer various activities for people of every age in a space that is beautiful, accessible and demonstrates that communities, like Newtown, can efficiently and responsibly produce their own resources. Most importantly, the Park will provide a unique and inspiring space for Newtown’s children as they grow older and advance through the school system.

 

Site-Planning and Process:

     Newtown’s five public schools are assembled in a rough circle. There are potential sites--which would be accessible to each school--around the middle. We are currently waiting for the State , with assistance from Newtown's Land Use Agency, to approve potential agricultural land for this project. Before the tragedy, we had made significant progress on this process, however, it must be understood that at this time, nearly every town department is overwhelmed with other duties. Land Use is one department that is getting back into operation... We have continued to advance by preparing the first version of our landscape plan for the Department of Agriculture. At the time the land is approved, the community will be invited to review our designs and add their own ideas. Specifically, there will be viewings held in the town hall/library, and all students will be sent home a summary of the park, with space to add their sketches and ideas. These sketches will be collected and used to inform the plan. Volunteers will be involved in installation and management following a final design process.

 

What does a Sustainable Community Park look like?

First, imagine a beautiful outdoor park, then replace the ornamental plants with species that grow delicious fruit throughout the year. Families are welcome to pick-nick, or harvest apples and chestnuts in the fall. Also, because of its proximity to Newtown’s Public schools, it will be a safe place for students to meet and hang out—one that trumps the typical home basement which so often become the predominant hangout-spots for Newtown’s youth. Instead, they may enjoy ripe berries along paths that connect each school, while passing signage, plaques and a map that explains how to identify and incorporate useful plants into daily life. Park users can play together in clearings, on the playground, or they may be quiet with themselves or a friend on a swing, or lounge in the shade on a hot day. The park is a place to gain skills and discover new hobbies; It is a safe community oriented space where the whole family can find something to do while being surrounded by nature.

 

How does this benefit the community? 

 

The sustainable community park will contain a few dynamic aspects. Most importantly, the park will include an organically managed vegetable field. Teachers would be welcome at the park and encouraged to bring their students and show them how the produce is grown. The produce will be given directly back to the community, specifically to the school cafeterias. The provision of local organics in school meals will encourage greater physical health by replacing some parts of currently mundane, low-nutrient "Chartwells" meals. The process of planning, growing, and providing this food will make our community mentally healthier—as those who choose to volunteer on the farm develop meaningful relationships with students and professionals within the educational system. 

 

The park will also contain a Mixed-Organic Orchard made up of hardy fruit trees that have been specifically selected for Connecticut's climate, and will be managed with cutting-edge, holistic management practices. The motivation behind creating a holistic, ecologically sound system is that we consider sustainable practices to be essential to the long-term future of any young person in our community. Exposure to sound ecological practices which function on a community scale is a crucial and necessary step towards insuring that this future exists. Beyond education and good fruit, the orchard will provide a pleasant walking and lounging space throughout the summer, and it will draw out the community to gather during harvest. Fruit can be picked on the spot; you can imagine kids sitting down in the shade of a persimmon tree to read a book, lounging in the shade with their friends, all while munching on a freshly picked apple.

 

Around and in between each element will be various recreation and leisure spaces which will be connected by walking paths. For example, gazebos will be artistically scattered throughout the park. These will provide all members of the community with quiet places of contemplation and observation, even a possible place to do homework or have a small meeting. For Newtown's youth, it might also provide the well-needed space for a budding romance—something which many of us who have grown up in Newtown, can attest to sorely needing. There will also be a green where children and teenagers alike can play Frisbee, soccer, or whatever strikes their desire at that moment—simply a safe place to play.

 

More than just a farm, the park will contain a playground and other 'low carbon' ways to have fun. The specifics of the playground--how it looks, its format and layout--will depend on input from the children themselves. Whether there are tunnels, mazes, things to climb, bounce or balance on is up to them. The playground will be tailored to fulfill the dreams of the children in our community, and is only constrained by their imagination and our financial boundaries.

 

Each part of the park will be accessible by paths, which connect to the existing hiking trails in town, and each school. After school, the park will serve as a safe place for the walkers* (see footnote) to meet and enjoy the delicious ripe berries and fragrant plants that line the sides of the trails. Many of these plants will be labeled as part of an effort to educate those who visit the park on how to identify and use various plants in their own lives. 

 

Creating a positive, natural environment for Newtown's youth will help the town recover from the horrific tragedy which occurred on December 14, 2012. Creating this sustainable community park will not only symbolically acknowledge this tragedy, it will also help the youth of our community move forward in an nurturing and educational manner while creating new experiences and new memories. 

 

 How to Help:

1:

The easiest way to help is by donating right on this fund page! 

2:

Whether you represent yourself, a business, or if you are interested in helping but do not have any spare cash, you can still make a donation to this project and deduct this donation as a charitable contribution on your federal taxes—it’s a win-win situation that doesn’t need to dig a hole in your pocket. A majority of your tax money is already used for federal government procurements given to various defense and security contractors, as well as defense-research grants. By making a charitable donation you are essentially taking funds that would have been taxed and used for military purposes and redirecting them to a sustainable development in a community in dire need of healing and purpose. 

Tax Deduction:

A donation to a local government qualifies as an itemized charitable deduction if the donation is made for a charitable purpose. Send a check for 'sustainable community park' to the mailing address below and request a receipt to deduct your donation for your federal income tax. 

 

Mailing Address:

 

Write out the check for 'sustainable community park'.

 

Newtown Park Gift Fund

Parks and Recreation Department

3 Main Street

Newtown, CT 06470

 

 

Can I help in non-financial ways?

3:

If you believe that you have skills or services that would be appropriate to incorporate in our park, then we are happy to accept non-financial contributions. This might include artwork, farm equipment, benches, useful gifts from companies that deal with playground equipment, hand tools and so on. Email ajm09@hampshire.edu about such gifts.

 

Most useful items:


Sturdy deer fencing. Baseball fence. Up to 3,000 feet.

Playground Equipment.

Farm Equipment

Organic Soil Amendments

Gazebos

Lumber 

Fruit Trees. Hardy to zone 6

Unique Art

Server Space / Web Hosting

 

Footnote

* 'The walkers' is an interesting phenomenon in our town, which was one of the original inspirations for a sustainable community park. Every weekday after school, hordes of young kids, grades 7 - 8, cross the streets from the Middle School, toward the center of town. They have come to be known as ‘the walkers’. They might get ice cream or a soda, and always mill about with their close friends and crushes. This lasts until they are told to leave. Often times, ‘walkers’ are escorted out of grocery stores when they clammer about without making a purchase. They are tossed back to the parking lot, eventually to confront a police officer who tries to break up the scene.

 

‘The walkers’ is certainly a fond memory for a lot of young people, but it is also a source of friction between shop owners, people in cars, parents, and the police who try to keep balance. It is not totally safe either. Secure paths to a growing oasis is a systematic solution to our young walkers.
