story:
THE BODY PRAYER

Being...

Deep and profound

Static and ecstatic

Changing and unflinching

Sad and happy

Being...

You are THAT.

Come and remember...


 

Short Summary

After many decades and life-times of struggle in exile, I have found a place to call home in the beautiful landscapes of South West Bohemia. Here, nested among nature and trees, on a hill of solid rock, I bought an old small farmhouse with a deep well built like a temple of large granite blocks.

It is a place for me to reclaim roots and spread my wings. A place for rest and remembering.

With my background in healing and soul work, I would like to open this home to like-minded community, to whom is in need of a retreat within and open-hearted mutual support, play, and healing.

What We Need & What You Get

In order for the property to serve as a sanctuary not just for me, but also for the wider community there are two rooms that need to be reconstructed before I can host guests. The wall between those particular rooms has been affected by damp and requires professional treatment which is beyond my means.

In addition, I plan to turn the barn which has beautiful granite walling into a workshop space perfect to hold Sacred Soul*Body Transmissions.

If the goal isn't reached I will continue working towards this vision with whatever means will be available to me.

It feels most natural to me to work from home, to share my home for healing and nourishment. I feel that this option is central to what I am able to offer to the world, and I have a lot to offer...

Here's what you will help to make possible. These are two core offerings that I consider to be the crux of my life's work. There are the Personalized Retreats for Individuals and Sacred Soul*Body Transmissions which will be held in small groups but can be also incorporated into an Individual Retreat. Please check these out and see if it resonates. These are highly unique offerings essential for human kind's evolution.

AND NOW FOR YOUR REWARDS!

My first new book – *Soulspeak*, focused entirely on pointing you back to who you are.  Learn more about it here.

1-0-1 Soulcraft Mentoring with me – more here.

A Quickie Session – Mini Guidance Session

Both can be held via Skype or Google Hangout. 

Oracular Transmission – details here

The PDF rewards will be delivered as soon as possible. The sessions will be scheduled for whenever suits us both. If there is anything that's urgent, let me know and I'll see what can be done.

Or you would be very welcome to stay with me in The Zahra Centre. Learn more about it here. This can be scheduled between May and September of 2017 and beyond.

If you have any questions related to these rewards please contact me.

The Impact

This project is valuable to the world because you won't find any other place to offer exactly this. The deeper message is crucial to a new way of being we are all learning as we enter a whole different age. It's intended to heal the wounds inflicted in the thousands of years of our past of non-respecting what's natural and restore what's true and authentic. The scale of this project isn't important, the strength is in the ripples...

Risks & Challenges

Challenges, challenges... I've overcome so many challenges to get to this point that I could write a novel, and in fact, I am writing one. The way I see it is that this is important for my evolution. It's important to pioneer this way of being for mankind's evolution. If there will be challenges, we'll deal with them, and we'll know how to deal with them when they come.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that sometimes we simply aren't in any position to help financially, god knows I've been there often enough, so if you resonate with my mission, it would mean the world to me if you could share it with your circle and with whom ever you think this might be a match for. And if you say a little bit about me or this project in your own words, it would have an even bigger impact. You can use the sharing buttons on this page or just copy and paste the URL. Thank you!

 

HEALING IS WHERE HOME IS


And now I've come to a place where I'm just very very tired... I've been lifetimes on the run, persecuted from all sides, yet taking no side myself. Now I just want to rest, to lie down in bed, cuddle with my animal companions, care for my life gently, do a little bit of what I love.

All I want is to take care of my home and watch animals, to have friends around who understand me. To dig in and inhale nature. To always have moss under my feet and pine scent in the air surrounding me. To touch soft grass and brass tree bark, to smell burning wood from life preserving fire. To drink clean water, and eat healthy food... To enjoy a bit of art's & crafts. To place my healing hands on those seeking touch. To share my experience with those who don't know where they are. To land home, a home which becomes a light within me.
With everything so soft and nurturing, where there is no need to be anyone or to defend anything.
A place from which there is nowhere else to go, where one can plant roots and spread wings. A grounded space, a supported space, a form that supports no form. A place where I can fall in love with life again. Where I no longer be a hermit but where I'll return to the place of belonging and say: Welcome, wanderer. Come in, rest. You will be fed. You have found your home here.

Healing is simple in nature's embrace where we remember how to embrace ourselves.

Modern world and modern spirituality would have you chase success, chase healing, chase happiness... but all of that leads in the wrong direction – away from yourself, getting further and further lost, deeper and deeper disconnected...
Here you will only rest. And in that simplicity, you will wait in a space to meet yourself.

 

 

I don't know where life is taking me,

and haven't yet decided

whether it feels scary

or free.

 

Perhaps I should be scared,

since I am yet to meet a person

who wouldn't ask

'Aren't you afraid?'

 

And I'm thinking,

the previous inhabitant

of this house

has lived here by herself since 1968,

till she was 96.

 

Fascinating woman that one.

She was born 'Zahradka',

married 'Zahradka',

and lived in a place called 'Zahradka',

all total coincidence of course.

 

That I almost bought the house

she was born in,

before I bought the one,

where she died,

also a total coincidence,

of course.

 

 

Respectfully

 

 

I didn't choose this place.

This place has chosen me,

and one by one it's uncovering

its ancient mysteries

 

The Beauty that lives here

is seeping into me.

Somehow, I look prettier,

when I'm here

 

I dropped right in

into its bio-system

Tuned in into the hum

of insects and birds

 

The elementals

of water, plants, and wind

are no longer

outside of me

 

I let it guide me

in what my hands shall build,

and it guides my Soul

how to grow roots

and butterfly wings

 

The beauty and overwhelm

that makes me drop my chin,

makes my heart quietly sing –

this place,

this here,

just this place,

this time,

right

now,

right

here...

I have created such beautiful healing space for myself that, paradoxically, I'm more aware of how ill the world outside of it is.

So besides bringing the healing space with me wherever I go, which is part of my own ongoing journey, I'd like to open its doors, the doors to a place where I found my home, to the world.

This place is mine, to create my own rules in, but I don't own it. It's a partner to me, and I belong to it just as it belongs to me, and it wants to be filled with my healing work just as it heals me, and open this healing to flow out into the world.

The water, the trees, the bees, the clouds and the wind, everything here is attuned to a very specific vibration – a tad witchy and shamanic – it invites to a feminine flowering, to an opening to the brilliance of the light that is found in the dark within. The darkness which everything springs from is almost palpable here. You can touch upon the pulse of divine creation and blessing. You will identify this pulse as your own. The dark womb of your Soul calls through the beauty of the world to return to your source.

It calls you to rest and unravel. To remember innocence. To trade the falsities of the busy world for a true belonging. It calls to a journey within, where the greatest treasures are excavated to be brought into the world without.

 

 

I heard 'Zahra' in a dream

in a place

like a temple built

from granite rock

its building blocks

 

I didn't know why

or what it means,

I looked it up

and saw 'the brilliance

of feminine flowering'

 

Whether Egyptian or Arabic

means little to me,

what matters is

the homecoming

and opening

 

A new grounding

for my ancient roots

that allow the buds

of my Self

to drink

from the deep well

on the hill

of solid rock

upon which

my house

is built

in The Silver Mountains

who like an old friend

are beckoning

me home

to myself

where I can feel

safe and

cared for

nourished by the land,

and to the land belonging,

like everyone, and any,

like the many

generations before me.

Like old rusty iron

Nature is reclaiming me

I've got twigs in my hair,

stars behind my ears,

and spiders on my shirt

 

Slowly

I am becoming

a part of the webs

that She weaves

 

I am the crisp sparkling morning,

and the pink twilight eve's

 

I am the honoring

of nature's beckoning

to grow with spring,

sleep by winter,

and in the autumn

to fall like the leafs

 

I am the knowing

that the winds that be blowing,

waters flowing,

are none other than me

 

I am the understanding

of the language

that the birds are singing,

lilac trees whispering,

that the ants are building,

bees are buzzing,

the deer are calling,

rain is drumming,

fire crackling

 

The grace that everything

is bringing

like festive bells is ringing

in my heart

in my lungs

in my ears.

 

This grace

that rings

like festive bells

in the heart of this place

and the glow of my face.

 

Come share with me this way of being, support the creation of The Zahra Centre.

You have my deep thanks for whichever way you choose to participate in making this possible. Please hit me up with any questions, suggestions or if you just want to connect.

You can also follow the development of The Zahra Centre if you join my mailing list.

With blessings.

Romana Anna Nova. x
story_txt:
THE BODY PRAYER
Being...
Deep and profound
Static and ecstatic
Changing and unflinching
Sad and happy
Being...
You are THAT.
Come and remember...

 
Short Summary
After many decades and life-times of struggle in exile, I have found a place to call home in the beautiful landscapes of South West Bohemia. Here, nested among nature and trees, on a hill of solid rock, I bought an old small farmhouse with a deep well built like a temple of large granite blocks.
It is a place for me to reclaim roots and spread my wings. A place for rest and remembering.
With my background in healing and soul work, I would like to open this home to like-minded community, to whom is in need of a retreat within and open-hearted mutual support, play, and healing.


What We Need & What You Get
In order for the property to serve as a sanctuary not just for me, but also for the wider community there are two rooms that need to be reconstructed before I can host guests. The wall between those particular rooms has been affected by damp and requires professional treatment which is beyond my means.
In addition, I plan to turn the barn which has beautiful granite walling into a workshop space perfect to hold Sacred Soul*Body Transmissions.
If the goal isn't reached I will continue working towards this vision with whatever means will be available to me.
It feels most natural to me to work from home, to share my home for healing and nourishment. I feel that this option is central to what I am able to offer to the world, and I have a lot to offer...
Here's what you will help to make possible. These are two core offerings that I consider to be the crux of my life's work. There are the Personalized Retreats for Individuals and Sacred Soul*Body Transmissions which will be held in small groups but can be also incorporated into an Individual Retreat. Please check these out and see if it resonates. These are highly unique offerings essential for human kind's evolution.
AND NOW FOR YOUR REWARDS!
My first new book – *Soulspeak*, focused entirely on pointing you back to who you are.  Learn more about it here.
1-0-1 Soulcraft Mentoring with me – more here.
A Quickie Session – Mini Guidance Session
Both can be held via Skype or Google Hangout. 
Oracular Transmission – details here
The PDF rewards will be delivered as soon as possible. The sessions will be scheduled for whenever suits us both. If there is anything that's urgent, let me know and I'll see what can be done.
Or you would be very welcome to stay with me in The Zahra Centre. Learn more about it here. This can be scheduled between May and September of 2017 and beyond.
If you have any questions related to these rewards please contact me.

The Impact

This project is valuable to the world because you won't find any other place to offer exactly this. The deeper message is crucial to a new way of being we are all learning as we enter a whole different age. It's intended to heal the wounds inflicted in the thousands of years of our past of non-respecting what's natural and restore what's true and authentic. The scale of this project isn't important, the strength is in the ripples...


Risks & Challenges
Challenges, challenges... I've overcome so many challenges to get to this point that I could write a novel, and in fact, I am writing one. The way I see it is that this is important for my evolution. It's important to pioneer this way of being for mankind's evolution. If there will be challenges, we'll deal with them, and we'll know how to deal with them when they come.


Other Ways You Can Help
I understand that sometimes we simply aren't in any position to help financially, god knows I've been there often enough, so if you resonate with my mission, it would mean the world to me if you could share it with your circle and with whom ever you think this might be a match for. And if you say a little bit about me or this project in your own words, it would have an even bigger impact. You can use the sharing buttons on this page or just copy and paste the URL. Thank you!
 
HEALING IS WHERE HOME IS

And now I've come to a place where I'm just very very tired... I've been lifetimes on the run, persecuted from all sides, yet taking no side myself. Now I just want to rest, to lie down in bed, cuddle with my animal companions, care for my life gently, do a little bit of what I love.All I want is to take care of my home and watch animals, to have friends around who understand me. To dig in and inhale nature. To always have moss under my feet and pine scent in the air surrounding me. To touch soft grass and brass tree bark, to smell burning wood from life preserving fire. To drink clean water, and eat healthy food... To enjoy a bit of art's & crafts. To place my healing hands on those seeking touch. To share my experience with those who don't know where they are. To land home, a home which becomes a light within me.With everything so soft and nurturing, where there is no need to be anyone or to defend anything.A place from which there is nowhere else to go, where one can plant roots and spread wings. A grounded space, a supported space, a form that supports no form. A place where I can fall in love with life again. Where I no longer be a hermit but where I'll return to the place of belonging and say: Welcome, wanderer. Come in, rest. You will be fed. You have found your home here.Healing is simple in nature's embrace where we remember how to embrace ourselves.Modern world and modern spirituality would have you chase success, chase healing, chase happiness... but all of that leads in the wrong direction – away from yourself, getting further and further lost, deeper and deeper disconnected...Here you will only rest. And in that simplicity, you will wait in a space to meet yourself.

 
 
I don't know where life is taking me,
and haven't yet decided
whether it feels scary
or free.
 
Perhaps I should be scared,
since I am yet to meet a person
who wouldn't ask
'Aren't you afraid?'
 
And I'm thinking,
the previous inhabitant
of this house
has lived here by herself since 1968,
till she was 96.
 
Fascinating woman that one.
She was born 'Zahradka',
married 'Zahradka',
and lived in a place called 'Zahradka',
all total coincidence of course.
 
That I almost bought the house
she was born in,
before I bought the one,
where she died,
also a total coincidence,
of course.
 
 
Respectfully
 
 
I didn't choose this place.
This place has chosen me,
and one by one it's uncovering
its ancient mysteries
 
The Beauty that lives here
is seeping into me.
Somehow, I look prettier,
when I'm here
 
I dropped right in
into its bio-system
Tuned in into the hum
of insects and birds
 
The elementals
of water, plants, and wind
are no longer
outside of me
 
I let it guide me
in what my hands shall build,
and it guides my Soul
how to grow roots
and butterfly wings
 
The beauty and overwhelm
that makes me drop my chin,
makes my heart quietly sing –
this place,
this here,
just this place,
this time,
right
now,
right
here...

I have created such beautiful healing space for myself that, paradoxically, I'm more aware of how ill the world outside of it is.
So besides bringing the healing space with me wherever I go, which is part of my own ongoing journey, I'd like to open its doors, the doors to a place where I found my home, to the world.
This place is mine, to create my own rules in, but I don't own it. It's a partner to me, and I belong to it just as it belongs to me, and it wants to be filled with my healing work just as it heals me, and open this healing to flow out into the world.
The water, the trees, the bees, the clouds and the wind, everything here is attuned to a very specific vibration – a tad witchy and shamanic – it invites to a feminine flowering, to an opening to the brilliance of the light that is found in the dark within. The darkness which everything springs from is almost palpable here. You can touch upon the pulse of divine creation and blessing. You will identify this pulse as your own. The dark womb of your Soul calls through the beauty of the world to return to your source.
It calls you to rest and unravel. To remember innocence. To trade the falsities of the busy world for a true belonging. It calls to a journey within, where the greatest treasures are excavated to be brought into the world without.

 
 
I heard 'Zahra' in a dream
in a place
like a temple built
from granite rock
its building blocks
 
I didn't know why
or what it means,
I looked it up
and saw 'the brilliance
of feminine flowering'
 
Whether Egyptian or Arabic
means little to me,
what matters is
the homecoming
and opening
 
A new grounding
for my ancient roots
that allow the buds
of my Self
to drink
from the deep well
on the hill
of solid rock
upon which
my house
is built
in The Silver Mountains
who like an old friend
are beckoning
me home
to myself
where I can feel
safe and
cared for
nourished by the land,
and to the land belonging,
like everyone, and any,
like the many
generations before me.

Like old rusty iron
Nature is reclaiming me
I've got twigs in my hair,
stars behind my ears,
and spiders on my shirt
 
Slowly
I am becoming
a part of the webs
that She weaves
 
I am the crisp sparkling morning,
and the pink twilight eve's
 
I am the honoring
of nature's beckoning
to grow with spring,
sleep by winter,
and in the autumn
to fall like the leafs
 
I am the knowing
that the winds that be blowing,
waters flowing,
are none other than me
 
I am the understanding
of the language
that the birds are singing,
lilac trees whispering,
that the ants are building,
bees are buzzing,
the deer are calling,
rain is drumming,
fire crackling
 
The grace that everything
is bringing
like festive bells is ringing
in my heart
in my lungs
in my ears.
 
This grace
that rings
like festive bells
in the heart of this place
and the glow of my face.
 
Come share with me this way of being, support the creation of The Zahra Centre.

You have my deep thanks for whichever way you choose to participate in making this possible. Please hit me up with any questions, suggestions or if you just want to connect.
You can also follow the development of The Zahra Centre if you join my mailing list.
With blessings.
Romana Anna Nova. x

story:
Unlimited Limbs

Unlimited Limbs is a non-profit that will provide prosthetics for wounded soldiers.   We have very experienced volunteers that are building automation machines for manufacturing custom prosthetics for our wounded soldiers. 

There has been a large outpouring of support and donations of equipment and machines but we know that money will be a constant battle for purchasing the materials we need to build our prosthetics, so we came up with a creative solution.


Project Details

Turning your $35,000 contribution into $250,000 per year!  There are approximately 2,500 Craft Breweries in the United States.  We are hoping to get 100 craft breweries (less than 5%) to participate and purchase bottle caps from us.  

Your contribution will go directly to building our bottle cap printing machine.  The machine will allow us to print images/logos onto bottle caps to sell to the craft brewing industry.  The machine is fully automated and easy to use.  This makes it easy to be run by our volunteers at Unlimited Limbs.  The machine will have the following features:   

  1. Sort and orient bottle caps using vibratory feeder
  2. Auto feed caps onto custom conveyor belt
  3. Automated conveyor belt for moving caps
  4. Pad print 4 colors onto each cap
  5. Print & dry 8 bottle caps every 2 seconds
  6. Inspect, count & reject station
  7. Box, package and print/place shipping label

We have organized several volunteers (engineers) to help design, build, integrate and test our new machine.  Our volunteers will also design all the software for the machine. We will need the funds for the following parts, materials and equipment:

  1. Stepper / Servo motors, AC motor, motor drivers, wires and connectors 
  2. PLCs, PLC Software, GUI Software
  3. High-speed inspection camera, cables and software 
  4. Connectors, din rails, enclosures, industrial power supplies, terminals 
  5. Stainless Steel Pneumatics, Dual Rod Pneumatics valves, drivers, hoses and fittings
  6. Linear Rails, mounts, pillow blocks, ballscrew (anti-backlash), etc...
  7. Pressure regulators, water trap, hoses, manual air valve switch
  8. Conveyor belt, gears, sprockets, chains, shaft, keystock, bearings and motors 
  9. Stainless steel nuts, bolts, washers and lock washers (various lengths/sizes)
  10. Raw materials (Extruded Aluminum, 16ga.Stainless Steel Sheets, 304L square tubing, 316L round tubes, food grade plastics, nylon 6/6, acetal, 316L wire,  
  11. Equipment (air compressor, industrial computer, industrial monitor)    
  12. Pad printing parts (inkwell cup, printed plates, silicon pads, mounting hardware etc...) 
  13. Pad printing materials (epoxy paint various colors, oil cleaning, sensitometric coating, developing liquid, corroding liquid, stripping liquid, etc...)
  14. Pad printing equipment (UV exposure unit and coating machine)
  15. Electronics (optical sensors, pressure sensors, magnetic sensors, user interface panel - 22mm switches, 22mm lights, emergency stop, - touchscreen display, 5Vdc/12Vdc/24Vdc power supplies, wire, cables, connectors, small motor drivers, etc... )
  16. Machining (CAD designs, custom machined metal & plastic pieces) 

We have alot of volunteers donating a great deal of their time to complete the machine. 

We thank you for your consideration.  Please help spread the word about our organization and this campaign.  www.unlimitedlimbs.org


Special Bottle Cap Perk


Card Perk - Poem by Robert W. Service

T-Shirt Perk

Windbreaker Perk



My Bio

My name is Bina Sanchez and I was born in Texas to a large family.  As an infant I contracted polio and it would limit my mobility for the rest of my life.  When I was a baby a woman visited our home and noticed me crawling with one leg dragging behind.  She immediately made an appointment with her personal doctor.  The doctor suspected polio and confirmed it with a specialist.  The woman helped our family fill out the proper paperwork to get a leg brace and the proper medical treatment.  Because of her generosity I was able to take my first steps at the age of three.  

I feel without the help of charities and philanthropic people, I would not be alive today.  I am grateful and feel that everyday is a gift.  Because of my experiences, I feel the need to help others. 


Bina reading to kids in Guatemala 

  

I am a field interpreter for a health organization giving aid in foreign countries.  I have traveled to poor countries to help build churches and build/remodel orphanages. 


Recently I needed a new leg brace and a good friend tried to help me, but the existing options were cost-prohibited.  He had an idea to build the brace using new technology to reduce the cost.  That got us talking about helping others.  Because of his years of service in the US Marine Corps, we decided to help our heroes, by building high quality, low-cost prosthetics.  Unlimited Limbs was born.

story:
50.000 Erkrankte und ihre Angehörigen jährlich brauchen Hilfe

Wir sind ein in für Deutschsprachige  tätiger Selbsthilfeverein, der sich um Patienten mit einem Hirn-Aneurysma oder Angiom kümmern. Es handelt sich hier um lebensgefährliche Erkrankungen, bei der eine Aussackung einer Hirn-Aterie platzen kann und die meistens erst durch eine Hirnblutung erkannt werden. Wenn Du eine solche Hirnblutung erleidest, dann beträgt Deine Überlebenswahrscheinlichkeit der ersten 30 Tage ca. 50 %. Wenn Du überlebst, dann stellen sich viele Fragen:

Kann ich / will ich wieder zurück in mein "altes Leben"?! Wieder ins Studium, Arbeiten, Auto fahren, Sport machen, Reisen...alles ist im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes "auf den Kopf gestellt". Oft sprechen Patienten Jahrzehntelang über das Davor und das Dannach.

Oft sind die Fragen aber noch ernster, wenn es mit der Bewegung, dem Sehen, der Konzentration nicht mehr richtig klappen will, Geschmacks- und Riechsinn verloren gegangen sind und damit die Umwelt ganz anders wahrgenommen wird.

Zunehmend werden aber auch Hirn-Aneurysmen oder Angiome durch Zufallsbefund bei Computer-Tomographie erkannt. Dann stellt sich Dir die schwere Entscheidung: Soll ich mich vorsorglich operieren lassen? Wie hoch ist das Risiko, dass ich diese Operation nur mit Schäden durchstehe?

Seit 1996 kümmern wir uns um, Dich, Deine Angehörigen, Freunde, Bekannten...

falls Sie ein solch einschneidenes Ereignis hatten. Wir haben mit unseren ärztlichen Beiräten Broschüren zu den Hintergründen der Erkrankung herausgegeben, die für viele erst die Erklärungen der Ärzte verständlich machten. Behandlungsmethoden werden erläutert, damit eine eigenständige Entscheidung möglich ist. Es sind aber auch Informationen, die Dir als Patienten, der häufig erst nach dem Aufwachen aus der Narkose nach seiner Operation erstmals erfährt, was da passiert ist, erklärt was und wieso dieses Ereignis geschehen ist.

Rehabilitation ist für Überlebende extrem wichtig!

Deshalb haben wir über die Jahre 12 Rehabilitations-PCs mit professioneller Software angeschafft, die wir unseren Mitgliedern für 3-9 Monate zur Heim-Reha zur Verfügung stellen. Wir haben auch mehrere Broschüren zur Rehabilitation herausgegeben.

Vortragsveranstaltungen mit Profis informieren...

...vor Ort jedes Jahr hunderte Menschen. Unsere Referenten sind Chefärzte der renomiertesten deutschen Kliniken, die den Ratsuchenden kostenlos ihre Kenntnisse in Vorträgen und Fragestunden zur Verfügung stellen.

DVDs der Veranstaltungen und der Operationstechniken können gegen eine kleine Spende beim Verein angefordert werden.

ABER: Der medizinische Fortschritt hat unsere Broschüren veralten lassen...

obwohl wir regelmäßige Nachträge zu den Broschüren herausbrachten. Leider konnte unser Gründungsvorstand selbst die Aktualisierung der Broschüren nicht mehr realisieren. 

So erfreulich der Fortschritt in der Medizin ist, er bringt und in Zugzwang und wir wollen daher die Broschüren zu den Behandlungsmethoden in einem ersten Schritt  schnellstmöglich - Zeithorizont ca. 16 Monate - mit unserem ärztlichen Beitrag auf den neuesten Stand bringen. Die Digitaltechnik wird uns helfen, neben einer Erstauflage künftig Folgeauflagen einfach im Print-on-demand-Verfahren zu erstellen, für das lediglich noch die bestehende Datei aktualisiert wird.

Unser ärztlicher Beirat benötigt hierzu jedoch die Hilfe weiterer Profis, die es verstehen, medizinische Sachverhalte, von einem Mediziner geschildert, in DEINE SPRACHE umzuschreiben, damit Du gerade als Patient oder alleingelassender Angehöriger, Freund oder Bekannter schnell verstehen kannst, woauf es ankommt.

Unser ärtzlicher Beirat, selbst Mitglied im Verein, arbeitet vollkommen unentgeltlich und ehrenamtlich für den Verein. Allerdings müssen wir uns die Hilfe von außen einkaufen, auch den Druck und die Gestaltung. Es ist ein Projekt, das Anfang 2016, zum 20jährigen Jubiläum des Vereins, fertig gestellt sein soll.

Denkt nach und helft mit! Was für Dich, für mich, für Uns allein zu viel Geld ist, schaffen wir alle zusammen, damit diese wichtige Information zustande kommt!

Vielen Dank für Deine Unterstützung!

Lorenz Dietrich
1. Vorstand
Verein für Hirn-Aneurysma-Erkrankte
-Der Lebenszweig - e.V.

[Just within Germany more than 50,000 Patient and their families need assistance

We are a support-group for German native speakers mainly, covering the topics of brain-aneurysm (SAB) and AVM. These ar life-threatening deseases that can result in a ruptured brain-atterie (sub-arachnoidal-bleeding - SAB). If one suffers an SAB he faces a survival rate of about 50 % within the first 30 days. If you survive many questions arise to you and your family:

Will I be able / do I want to return to my "old life"? Will I be able to study agian, work, drive a car, do sports, travel...Ones whole life turns upside-down.
Often ones problems are even more serious, if mobility, eye-sight, concentration etc. won't function properly, smelling or tasting are disabled and ones environment is perceived differently.

Often aneurysms or AVM are discovered randomly by CT. A patient has to decide weather to undergo surgery precautionary, needs information about the individual risk that arrises from surgery.

Since 1996 we care about you, your relatives, and friends...

in case you suffered such a desease. Together with our medical advisory boards we issued brochures to the medical background which help patient to understand their desease. Methods of treatment are explained so patients will be able to make a well informed independent decision (if possible). But these brochures also help you as a patient waking up from anesthesia or coma to understand, what happened to you, explains what happened and WHY ME?

Rehabilitation is of high importance to survivors!

This is why we offer a dozen PCs equiped with professional rehab-software. We offer thes PCs to our members free of charge for a limited time of 3-9 months for home-training. We also issued several brochures toward rehabilitation.

Lectures by Experts for Patients ...

...inform anualy hundreds of people in different cities. Our speakers are medical experts of the most sophisticated clinics who offer their knowledge in lectures and FAQ-interviews free of charge.

DVDs of the lectures and of the operation-methods are provided for a small donation.

BUT: Medical Progress let our Brouchures become outdated...

..even though we regularly updated by issuing addons. As we are thankfull for medical  progress on the one hand it gives us problems to keep you informed to the new operation techniques. This is why we approach you to hellp us finance the update of our main brochure in a time-rage of approx. 16 months. Digital  publishing helps us to update in the future in producing print-on-demand which needs only to update the digital data.

Our medical board is member of our society and is autoring free of charge. But we need to get additional professional help from outside the society to convert  the medical articles to common language. Printing and layout are additional cost we have to coaver. This only enables you as patient, friend or realtiv to understand, what you desease is all about.

The whole project is planned to be finished by the beginning of 2016 - the 20th anniversary of the society. We will not be able to do it on our own - but all together WE CAN!

So please support us, even if it's just a small amount: Never underestimate the crowd!

Thank you for your support!

Lorenz Dietrich
President / 1. Vorstand

Wenn Du überlebst, dann stellen sich viele Fragen:Kann ich / will ich wieder zurück in mein "altes Leben"?! Wieder ins Studium, Arbeiten, Auto fahren, Sport machen, Reisen...alles ist im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes "auf den Kopf gestellt". Oft sprechen Patienten Jahrzehntelang über das Davor und das Dannach.Oft sind die Fragen aber noch ernster, wenn es mit der Bewegung, dem Sehen, der Konzentration nicht mehr richtig klappen will, Geschmacks- und Riechsinn verloren gegangen sind und damit die Umwelt ganz anders wahrgenommen wird.Zunehmend werden aber auch Hirn-Aneurysmen oder Angiome durch Zufallsbefund bei Computer-Tomographie erkannt. Dann stellt sich Dir die schwere Entscheidung: Soll ich mich vorsorglich operieren lassen? Wie hoch ist das Risiko, dass ich diese Operation nur mit Schäden durchstehe?Seit 1996 kümmern wir uns um, Dich, Deine Angehörigen, Freunde, Bekannten...falls Sie ein solch einschneidenes Ereignis hatten. Wir haben mit unseren ärztlichen Beiräten Broschüren zu den Hintergründen der Erkrankung herausgegeben, die für viele erst die Erklärungen der Ärzte verständlich machten. Behandlungsmethoden werden erläutert, damit eine eigenständige Entscheidung möglich ist. Es sind aber auch Informationen, die Dir als Patienten, der häufig erst nach dem Aufwachen aus der Narkose nach seiner Operation erstmals erfährt, was da passiert ist, erklärt was und wieso dieses Ereignis geschehen ist.Rehabilitation ist für Überlebende extrem wichtig!Deshalb haben wir über die Jahre 12 Rehabilitations-PCs mit professioneller Software angeschafft, die wir unseren Mitgliedern für 3-9 Monate zur Heim-Reha zur Verfügung stellen. Wir haben auch mehrere Broschüren zur Rehabilitation herausgegeben.Vortragsveranstaltungen mit Profis informieren......vor Ort jedes Jahr hunderte Menschen. Unsere Referenten sind Chefärzte der renomiertesten deutschen Kliniken, die den Ratsuchenden kostenlos ihre Kenntnisse in Vorträgen und Fragestunden zur Verfügung stellen.DVDs der Veranstaltungen und der Operationstechniken können gegen eine kleine Spende beim Verein angefordert werden.ABER: Der medizinische Fortschritt hat unsere Broschüren veralten lassen...obwohl wir regelmäßige Nachträge zu den Broschüren herausbrachten. Leider konnte unser Gründungsvorstand selbst die Aktualisierung der Broschüren nicht mehr realisieren. So erfreulich der Fortschritt in der Medizin ist, er bringt und in Zugzwang und wir wollen daher die Broschüren zu den Behandlungsmethoden in einem ersten Schritt  schnellstmöglich - Zeithorizont ca. 16 Monate - mit unserem ärztlichen Beitrag auf den neuesten Stand bringen. Die Digitaltechnik wird uns helfen, neben einer Erstauflage künftig Folgeauflagen einfach im Print-on-demand-Verfahren zu erstellen, für das lediglich noch die bestehende Datei aktualisiert wird.Unser ärztlicher Beirat benötigt hierzu jedoch die Hilfe weiterer Profis, die es verstehen, medizinische Sachverhalte, von einem Mediziner geschildert, in DEINE SPRACHE umzuschreiben, damit Du gerade als Patient oder alleingelassender Angehöriger, Freund oder Bekannter schnell verstehen kannst, woauf es ankommt.Unser ärtzlicher Beirat, selbst Mitglied im Verein, arbeitet vollkommen unentgeltlich und ehrenamtlich für den Verein. Allerdings müssen wir uns die Hilfe von außen einkaufen, auch den Druck und die Gestaltung. Es ist ein Projekt, das Anfang 2016, zum 20jährigen Jubiläum des Vereins, fertig gestellt sein soll.Denkt nach und helft mit! Was für Dich, für mich, für Uns allein zu viel Geld ist, schaffen wir alle zusammen, damit diese wichtige Information zustande kommt!Vielen Dank für Deine Unterstützung!Lorenz Dietrich1. VorstandVerein für Hirn-Aneurysma-Erkrankte-Der Lebenszweig - e.V.[Just within Germany more than 50,000 Patient and their families need assistanceWe are a support-group for German native speakers mainly, covering the topics of brain-aneurysm (SAB) and AVM. These ar life-threatening deseases that can result in a ruptured brain-atterie (sub-arachnoidal-bleeding - SAB). If one suffers an SAB he faces a survival rate of about 50 % within the first 30 days. If you survive many questions arise to you and your family:Will I be able / do I want to return to my "old life"? Will I be able to study agian, work, drive a car, do sports, travel...Ones whole life turns upside-down.Often ones problems are even more serious, if mobility, eye-sight, concentration etc. won't function properly, smelling or tasting are disabled and ones environment is perceived differently.Often aneurysms or AVM are discovered randomly by CT. A patient has to decide weather to undergo surgery precautionary, needs information about the individual risk that arrises from surgery.Since 1996 we care about you, your relatives, and friends...in case you suffered such a desease. Together with our medical advisory boards we issued brochures to the medical background which help patient to understand their desease. Methods of treatment are explained so patients will be able to make a well informed independent decision (if possible). But these brochures also help you as a patient waking up from anesthesia or coma to understand, what happened to you, explains what happened and WHY ME?Rehabilitation is of high importance to survivors!This is why we offer a dozen PCs equiped with professional rehab-software. We offer thes PCs to our members free of charge for a limited time of 3-9 months for home-training. We also issued several brochures toward rehabilitation. Lectures by Experts for Patients ......inform anualy hundreds of people in different cities. Our speakers are medical experts of the most sophisticated clinics who offer their knowledge in lectures and FAQ-interviews free of charge.DVDs of the lectures and of the operation-methods are provided for a small donation.BUT: Medical Progress let our Brouchures become outdated.....even though we regularly updated by issuing addons. As we are thankfull for medical  progress on the one hand it gives us problems to keep you informed to the new operation techniques. This is why we approach you to hellp us finance the update of our main brochure in a time-rage of approx. 16 months. Digital  publishing helps us to update in the future in producing print-on-demand which needs only to update the digital data.Our medical board is member of our society and is autoring free of charge. But we need to get additional professional help from outside the society to convert  the medical articles to common language. Printing and layout are additional cost we have to coaver. This only enables you as patient, friend or realtiv to understand, what you desease is all about. The whole project is planned to be finished by the beginning of 2016 - the 20th anniversary of the society. We will not be able to do it on our own - but all together WE CAN!So please support us, even if it's just a small amount: Never underestimate the crowd!Thank you for your support!Lorenz DietrichPresident / 1. Vorstand

story:
Angela has stage 4, HER2 positive metastatic breast cancer, which has over the past 3 years spread to her bones, brain and now liver. This amazing woman which I am so proud to call my mother has endured so much since she was diagnosed, taking this battle day by day. She has been blessed that until now, her treatments have been covered, but her last HER2 targeted therapy is no longer proving to be effective, and now it's time to change yet again. The new drug she needs is called "Kadcyla", also known as "T-DM1" and costs approximately $7000 a month, which is more than we can afford. Angela needs angels to help make the receiving of this medication a reality.

For those of you who don't know, HER2 is a type of breast cancer found in 15%-20% of breast cancer patients. It is a specialized protein found on breast cancer cells that controls cancer growth and spread. It acts as a signal to speed up the spreading of the cancer cells. The therapies available for HER2 act as a signal shut-off, to stop or slow down the speeding of the cancer cells. Like most drugs, the body eventually finds a way around the effectiveness of these drugs, which then makes it necessary to switch to another one. Over the 3 years of having breast cancer, my mother has had to have a hip reconstruction due to the deterioration of her bones, has tumors in her spine, has had 3 brain tumors, infections in her leg and gum due to side effects, and now has 3 liver tumors. I admire the strength, faith and hope my mom has shown on a daily basis throughout this difficult time for us, please help not only her, but our family and all those who love her keep hope alive. Our goal is to raise enough money so that she has a years supply of Kadcyla.

story:
On June 7, 2014, 18 year old Angella was passenger in a terrible car accident that flew off the road into a ravine. They air lifted her to a trauma center.  She suffered severe head trauma and was put into a medically induced coma to combat the effects. Drains were put in  through her spine to alleviate the fluid from accumulating and minimize the swelling in her head. This seemed to work. Angella was responsive to the pain reception test and was able to move her limbs and open her eyes once. That same night, things took a turn for the worse. The swelling came back. She was sent in for emergency surgery to remove a plate of skull bone to relieve the pressure.  Surgery went well and vitals are stable. However, the long road to recovery is not over.

Her Mom and Dad are from Fullerton, CA. They are staying at a hotel nearby the hospital, nearly 2 hours away so they don't miss a step with Angella's recovery. Even with good insurance, there are amazing expenses that are not covered, copays, cost of room and board for her family, not to mention the treatment she will need on her road to recovery and aftercare. That's where you come in, Angels for Angie.

She has an overwhelming amount of love and support from her family and friends , however, she and her family will still need financial relief as expenses pile up. We have set up this account to help Angella and Family with any expenses acquired now and on her road to recovery and treatment. Also, if you know Angella, share her story. Any donations, time and support is greatly appreciated by all her family and friends. She needs love, light and positive thoughts her way! God bless...

You can also donate direct at any Well Fargo Bank under the account name "Angels for Angie Fund".  $8,000.00 is only our goal. Thank you!

(updates will be posted periodically, check the " update " section.)

story:
I have reached my base goal! Thank you all so much! 

I am really, really excited to be going to Pennsic War in a few weeks. I know I will be able to fully relax for a change, knowing my needs have been covered!

I will post updates from the event, here on on the Facebook page, when possible. It is a bit tricky, as both wifi and electric outlets are scarce. I will do my best.

Please, everyone, send me your mailing address, so I can send you your perks! Indiegogo does NOT supply me with that information, nor does Paypal.

Please be sure to read my updates for the latest information about this campaign.

••••

I am Lady Aoife í Dalasýsla, also known as Siací Ross. I am an active participant in the Society for Creative Anachronism, an organization dedicated to learning about the medieval past through living and doing. I have been "playing," as we call it, with the SCA for about 28 years. The Pennsic War is the SCA's largest camping event, with over 10,000 people gathering in western Pennsylvania for two weeks every year. This is the 44th year of this event, and the 49th year of the SCA in general.

I have joint-related disabilities which challenge my ability my to exercize (it hurts to move, but I am better off if I move). I am diabetic, asthmatic, and have other stupid health issues. I benefit from exercise. At War, people walk everywhere they go, on grass paths and dirt roads. This is an ideal workout for me!

I also have a trauma-related anxiety disorder and PTSD. In the past decade, these conditions got so bad that I was no longer able to work or play in the SCA. I am now under excellent treatment, and making exceptional progress. My treatment team tailors treatment to my needs, and are creative in there approach.

My therapist has been encoraging me to get out and socialize again; the SCA has been a good place to start. A good friend generously brought me to a few local events this winter. I am happy to report that I am starting to make new friends and feel less afraid around them! As a result, my therapist has encouraged me to return to Pennsic War as a form of therapy! How cool is that? Pennsic War is the natural next step. 

I really want to go! Your donation will get me there!

     


Going to Pennsic War gives me an opportunity to slow down and heal. I will, unplug from all electronics while I was there. My sleep will be guided by the rising and setting sun, highly benficial as I have had chronic insomnia for decades! I will exchange city streets for footpaths and fresh air, eat when I am hungry, rest when I need to, and I will slow down in general.

This is the part of SCA life that makes this plan possible: SCAdiens themselves. ❤️

The SCA has a culture I am familiar with, one that expects — insists — that people to behave with courtesy and respect. If I drop something, someone will return it. If I feel ill, immediately people will help if they can (there is medical staff & EMTs on hand as well). If someone messes with me, several burly men and strapping lasses will appear and ask, "Is this gentle bothering you, m'lady?" And security makes the miscreant go away! People walk each other home at night as a matter of routine. People make sure their companions, and strangers, stay hydrated and fed. It is a very supportive place to be.

As two-week vacations go, Pennsic is relatively cheap because it is camping. Participnts bring everything they need with them, including shelter. This is far more doable than going on a cruise, or checking into a spa...and it is friendlier!

I am on a fixed income, and can cover some of my expenses. I am making my own garb (because we dress in period clothes the whole two weeks!) from fabric I already had. I am borrowing much of the equipment, such as a tent, cooler, and a rainfly. Friends and strangers have gifted me with garb accessories. Some items I am making from scratch (a woolen camp quilt) or repurposing from everyday use (plant stand becomes camp stool/table! Woolen blanket becomes cloak!).

WHERE THE MONEY WILL GO

• I wish to have enough funds with me to get myself home on my own, if need be. This has always been a safety practice I stick to, and as a single person without close family, it is a sensible precaution. 

• I need to provide for my own food for two weeks. Many buy onsite from vendors. I can't afford to do that. I will buy groceries locally and cook for myself. Healthier that way, too.

• I need proper bedding; my joints do not allow for me to sleep close to or on the ground. This will consist of a bed or cot platform and an airmattress. 

• I must pay camp fees of roughly $60. The group I stay with pools funds, and in return buys firewood, provides a fully-equipped community camp kitchen and a camp shower,  the latter two of which use propane. 

• I have other needs specific to this endeavor and my health concerns, such as good walking shoes, a "tent cooler" (can be constructed for under $50 with a donated utility bucket), and a simple battery operated fan. 

•I have arranged transportation for the 800-mile round trip, and would like to contribute to travel expenses, as I should. When people take me into the local town (bank, grocery/medicines/other ordinary needs), I wish to offer them gas money. 

• I also wish to pay to use Mystic Mail services, which is the internet cafe on site, as I hope to blog the event for you all. There is no wifi site-wide...this is the middle ages, after all!

Update: June 17, 2015:

This fundraiser now at 80% of goal!

*§* If this campaign exceeds my goal, funds will be used to obtain equipment of my own for next year's trip. After that, extra funds will towards setting up a proper blog for my SCA experiences.*§*

The fundraiser is open-ended, but a deadline for my goal is necessary so that I will have what I need before I go. I leave during the last week of July!

I am grateful for your support. Thank you.

More info: http://SCA.org

http://pennsicwar.org

If any Pennsic-voyaging donor would like to meet up with me at Pennsic, I would be delighted to do so! 

If any donor would like to know more about the SCA, I would be happy to answer questions.

I am interested in Norse, Såmi amd Viking cultures. I sew, spin, weave, knit, bead and enjoy other handcrafts. Pennsic has a free University; I would love to take some classes. I enjoy cooking over a fire, taking photos of the beautiful setting at Cooper's Lake, and spending time in conversation with new friends. I am supposed to slow down for two weeks, doctors' orders. One thousand years ago is the slowest place I know!

Camp image credit: an iconoclast under Creative Commons licencing, commercial use allowed.

Other images: Criag Hatfield,  under Creative Commons licencing, commercial use allowed.

You may reach me via the Facebook page attached to this fundraiser, this site, and: s • i •a •c •a •l •i •n •a •t •g •m •a •i •l •d •o •t •c •o •m

Thank you for your contribution!

story:
The Cause:

We want to get Littmann Cardiology III Stethoscopes for the Handa Emergency Hospital in Battambang Cambodia.

The Handa Emergency Hospital was originally founded as a surgical trauma center for landmine victims. Its surgeons and nurses provide high quality care for those who are poor and disadvantaged in northwestern Cambodia, an area still littered with mines.

The Handa Foundation also has a mission to increase the human capital of the Cambodian medical sector. They are training the next generation of Cambodian doctors, nurses and surgeons.

See a video from the Handa Foundation HERE.

What We Need:

The staff of the hospital work very hard to provide a high level of care with very few resources. They are training a new set of internal medicine students, but these students don't even have stethoscopes. They only need 10, and it is very difficult to get high quality stethoscopes in Cambodia. We are trying to get them as many as we can. We have set our goal as $600 so that we can hopefully purchase 4 of those stethoscopes.

The stethoscopes we are purchasing cost about $145 each if bought as a set. They will be coming from Medisave.net, and a link to the product is below.

http://www.medisave.net/littmann-stethoscopes/littmann-cardiology-iii-stethoscope/littmann-cardiology.html

We only need 10 of these stethoscopes and we are hoping to raise $600 at a minimum, ideally we would like the full $1,450. Every cent of this fundraiser that we raise will help us get more stethoscopes to these doctors and students. If we get less than $1,450, we will buy as many scopes as we can.

If we exceed the amount needed, all the extra money will be donated directly to the hospital to provide for their poor patients fund. Here is a story about the poor patients fund as told by the Nursing Director of the hospital, Chiara Gifford:

"Two weeks ago a woman came into the medical clinic in a coma.  She is 37 years old with three children.  She was diagnosed with hyperthyroidism that caused her to go into atrial fibrillation that caused her to have a stroke that caused her to go into a diabetic coma.   We straightened out the blood sugar and thyroid and gave her anticoagulation and after two weeks she went home even being able to move her right leg and arm, though still needing rehab.  Her entire visit cost $309.00 but the poor patients’ fund had only $14.00 left in it.  She is a rice farmer’s wife and they have no money to pay.  They will spend several years trying to pay us the $295.00."

Regardless of how much money we raise, all of it will go towards strengthening this hospital and providing for the poor and disadvantaged of Cambodia.  

The Impact:

The Handa Hospital is the only high level trauma care center in northwestern Cambodia. If this facility didn't exist, the closest comparable facility is 5 hours away in Phnom Penh. The addition of these stethoscopes will help this hospital better serve the people of Cambodia, and save many lives.

Your contribution will make a substantial difference in this community. You will be providing a doctor with a basic tool for treating patients, allowing them to save lives in a country still afflicted by the memories of war.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't give, we understand. Regardless, we would really appreciate it if you would spread the word to all your friends and family. Please help us make this spread!


Thanks!

Eric & John
story_txt:
The Cause:
We want to get Littmann Cardiology III Stethoscopes for the Handa Emergency Hospital in Battambang Cambodia.
The Handa Emergency Hospital was originally founded as a surgical trauma center for landmine victims. Its surgeons and nurses provide high quality care for those who are poor and disadvantaged in northwestern Cambodia, an area still littered with mines.
The Handa Foundation also has a mission to increase the human capital of the Cambodian medical sector. They are training the next generation of Cambodian doctors, nurses and surgeons.
See a video from the Handa Foundation HERE.


What We Need:
The staff of the hospital work very hard to provide a high level of care with very few resources. They are training a new set of internal medicine students, but these students don't even have stethoscopes. They only need 10, and it is very difficult to get high quality stethoscopes in Cambodia. We are trying to get them as many as we can. We have set our goal as $600 so that we can hopefully purchase 4 of those stethoscopes.
The stethoscopes we are purchasing cost about $145 each if bought as a set. They will be coming from Medisave.net, and a link to the product is below.
http://www.medisave.net/littmann-stethoscopes/littmann-cardiology-iii-stethoscope/littmann-cardiology.html
We only need 10 of these stethoscopes and we are hoping to raise $600 at a minimum, ideally we would like the full $1,450. Every cent of this fundraiser that we raise will help us get more stethoscopes to these doctors and students. If we get less than $1,450, we will buy as many scopes as we can.
If we exceed the amount needed, all the extra money will be donated directly to the hospital to provide for their poor patients fund. Here is a story about the poor patients fund as told by the Nursing Director of the hospital, Chiara Gifford:
"Two weeks ago a woman came into the medical clinic in a coma.  She is 37 years old with three children.  She was diagnosed with hyperthyroidism that caused her to go into atrial fibrillation that caused her to have a stroke that caused her to go into a diabetic coma.   We straightened out the blood sugar and thyroid and gave her anticoagulation and after two weeks she went home even being able to move her right leg and arm, though still needing rehab.  Her entire visit cost $309.00 but the poor patients’ fund had only $14.00 left in it.  She is a rice farmer’s wife and they have no money to pay.  They will spend several years trying to pay us the $295.00."
Regardless of how much money we raise, all of it will go towards strengthening this hospital and providing for the poor and disadvantaged of Cambodia.  


The Impact:
The Handa Hospital is the only high level trauma care center in northwestern Cambodia. If this facility didn't exist, the closest comparable facility is 5 hours away in Phnom Penh. The addition of these stethoscopes will help this hospital better serve the people of Cambodia, and save many lives.
Your contribution will make a substantial difference in this community. You will be providing a doctor with a basic tool for treating patients, allowing them to save lives in a country still afflicted by the memories of war.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't give, we understand. Regardless, we would really appreciate it if you would spread the word to all your friends and family. Please help us make this spread!
Thanks!
Eric & John

story:
My name is Alyssa Otero. I was born and raised in Santa Fe, New Mexico.  I have spent the last several years of my life dedicating myself to learning the most I can about nutrition, health and natural medicine.  I have always loved lotions, body scrubs, lip balms, and other beauty products.  One day I got the idea to start messing around and creating my own. The love and passion grew for making such products and soon I wanted to share this love with everyone.  I have always been interested in the healing properties of herbs and essential oils, so I began infusing my products and trying to fine tune each formula.  My only problem is...

 

I need help raising enough money to make more of this wonderful product to share with the world!! Every single one of the dollars contributed to this campaign will go directly towards reaching my goal and starting my very first own business. Please help support me in reaching my goal, and even if I don't reach it I will take all I can get.  

I am also going to be taking orders for hand & body butters and lip balms.

$18 for 8oz. hand & body butter

$8 for lip balm

Plus shipping and handling if you are not in Santa Fe.

Send me a message or comment with your email if you are interested in ordering.

 


With much love, gratitude and appreciation,

Thank you,

Alyssa Otero

Founder of Skin Savor Body Care

story:
For my undergraduate thesis, I created a course using flying trapeze as a form of experiential therapy. As soon as I learned to fly, I started to feel the healing effects that trapeze has to offer. When I started teaching flying trapeze, I saw how it healed others as well. Throughout the past year, I have researched how the healing processes work and how flying through the air might be therapeutic.  As a culmination of my thesis, I am going to build a flying trapeze on the Hampshire College campus the weekend of May 11th, to offer free classes and single swings to students, as well as staff and faculty. My hope is that this project will help me continue my research as well as help students de-stress after finals, have fun and try something they have never done before. You can help by donating anything from $1 to $100 dollars. Truly, anything helps. I have an amazing team helping me put this together, but we still need some money to get it going. With your help, I hope to be able to pay everyone who has put so much hard work and time into making this happen. I believe that flying trapeze can help people overcome their fears and take a leap into the unknown, which can lead to finding the courage to pursue other things in life.  

If you donate, you will have priority in taking a swing or a full class during the weekend we will have the rig up. I want to give everyone a try, but there is limited space in each class. If you can’t donate, please tell others about my campaign and get the word out! Anything helps!

Thank you all!

story:
What We Need & What You Get

  • The eChariot is a one of a kind electric tricycle and we are seeking funds to perfect the "trike" and to begin mass production.  The retail price of the eChariot is expected to be $1,899 once we reach full production.  For providing us funding to achieve our goal, we are offering an incredibly low price of $699 for a limited time.  This is an amazing offer, as even the most basic two-wheel electric bicycles cost thousands of dollars.

Why eChariot?

  • There is no other tricycle like the eChariot on the market today.  The extreme comfort of the seat, size and power of the wheels, strong motor and sleek design, truly allows you to "ride like an emperor."  The eChariot is very utilitarian and includes a stylish and spacious basket for trips to the grocery store, transporting your pet or carrying a cooler for a fun day at the beach.  The tricycle can travel a distance of 15 to 20 miles at speeds up to 20 MPH before needing to be recharged.  There is no other tricycle like the eChariot and we are offering it for the extremely low price of $699.

The Current Specifications for the eCariot are:

  • 500 watt motor with capability of speeds up to 20 mph, but "governed" at time of sale to max out at 12 mph for safety. Can be adjusted. 
  • 36 volt, 22 amp motor controller
  • Variable speed throttle with single speed pedaling
  • LiFePO4 lithium ion 36 volt, 10ah battery. 
  • 26"x4" wheels
  • Front hub direct drive motor
  • Front and rear disc brakes

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help get the word out and tell your friends about our campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!


*The eChariot shown is our concept tricycle.  The final production model will receive upgrades to the frame and other parts.  The eChariot has not been endorsed by any third party manufacturers associated with the concept model.

story:
I’m Bevin Branlandingham, the Femmecee and Founder of Fat Kid Dance Party aerobics (For All Sizes to Heal from Body Oppression). It’s a safe(r) space in LA for people of all sizes to feel good about their bodies, boost their joy, and rip up the dance floor. Now, I want to take the same message to everyone, regardless of location!

I created the class in response to bullying and other traumatic experiences I had growing up and living fat in the world. I internalized the messages that being fat is bad, and that I should be ashamed of what I looked like. Whenever I would try to dance or move in any way in public, I felt a lot of judgement that made me want to stop moving altogether. Most people who have been fat know that shame doesn’t create weight loss. (In this fatphobic society, if shame worked everyone would be thin!)

After serving as a thought leader in the body positive movement for over a decade, I’ve decided to create the kind of dance class I wish I had when I was a kid, and throughout my life. Something that wasn’t about weight loss or making our bodies look like those in a magazine, but focused on radically affirming all bodies. Something that helps to build not just self esteem but self love. And most importantly something that at its core helps to spark that deep fire of joy that lives in all bodies—but perhaps has been dormant in some of us for far too long. 

PopSugar did a video about my class this summer and the response has been overwhelming. Almost 4 million people have seen the video and the number one response has been: “How can I get this class where I live?” Now, I want to bring it to everyone who needs a cheerleader worldwide! But I need your help to do it… 

I am creating a Fat Kid Dance Party workout series that people can download and dance along with right in their living room. Production costs are particularly high for these types of videos, especially licensing for awesome music, which I believe is a key element of sparking joy. I’ve bought hundred dollar workouts with only one recognizable song and felt so let down by that - so the more money we raise the more fab music we can license, the higher the production value for the videos and the more I can move towards creating a body affirming movement series!

If you’re interested in affirming joyful movement class or learning some hot new moves to tear up the dance floor…

Support this project by pre-ordering now and sharing with your friends!!!

I can’t wait to party with you!

One more thing: I call this class Fat Kid Dance Party (For All Sizes to Heal from Body Oppression) because body negativity affects everyone. I want to be your cheerleader for resilience no matter what size you are because all bodies are worthy of love exactly as they are right now!
